story:
INTRODUCTION

Murphy Eze (Chef)
I am Murphy Eze, with over seven years of extensive experience in cooking French cuisine. Experience with operating a
dining service of up to 200 tables while supervising staff to ensure they perform to the best of
their ability during service. I was passionate about cooking and enjoy seeing clients satisfied
eating the exquisite food that I make.
I graduated top in my class in 2013 from Liaison College in Culinary Arts.

Elsie Eze (Self Employed)
I'm Elsie Eze, with over 15 years of experience running a professional commercial cleaning company. The company services commercial and medical buildings, homes, and condos.  I manage to be a staff of 8 and enjoys being an entrepreneur.

With many years of business, and industry-compatible experience, the principals (Murphy and
Elsie Eze) we have developed sound skill sets that properly suit operating a business such as Slick Joint.  We thoroughly understood the subject market, the fundamentals of the industry segment, the business model, its best practices, and what is required to succeed.

The purpose of this campaign

Is to illustrate the feasibility of establishing a casual fare /  quick-service and take-out café / shop in Toronto, Ontario to move our business from home to the street of Toronto, Ontario. The menu cuisine will be primarily based on fresh convenience and finger foods. The company will trade as Slick Joint. It is a  registered proprietorship owned and operated by Murphy and Elsie Eze (“the principals”) who are experienced professionals and chef Murray Eze will run the kitchen.

 

The reason why we need your help to raise the funds

Why did we need your help?

To open a slick Joint shop in Toronto street and brings customers from the opening day as a new shop. We are going to provide food for any customers who can not afford to buy it.

Welcome to Family of Slick Joint

Chef Murphy and Elsie Eze 

We need your help to raise the funds. We are home base gourmet pastries and street finger foods. Through the pandemic coronavirus, we persevere and believe the future is bright. we need all your help from the Slick Joint opening, Sept 30th,2021.

We need funds for the shop and renovations. We need your generosity, kindness, and support to bring our shop to life on Toronto street. All our cuisines are fresh food prepared and cooked on the spot.

Our menu is from all over the world with finger gourmet cuisine. 

We are one shop Gourmet Street Cuisine and Pastries needs.  We pledge to raise $50,000 to accomplish the goal and also, the donations are not free slick Joint will send out vouchers a week before the Grand opening to all our kind-hearted customers to redeem the donations for any products in our shop, we need your support, in any contributions you make will have an impact in reaching out to our goal and come and join the Slick Joint family for the celebration., God bless us all thanks.

Your help and support to raise this fund with any amount of your contributions will help us in achieving our goal.

SHORT TERM (36 MONTHS) GOALS

  1. To execute a detailed and efficient marketing campaign (see marketing
  2. section) as expeditiously as possible
  3. To accomplish minimum revenues of $440,000 for Fiscal Year End 1 (“FYE 1”), $ 610,000
  4. for FYE 2, and $700,000 for FYE 3
  5. To maintain strong net profit margins and profitability by the end of FYE 1
  6. To continuously increase the shop’s goodwill and client base
  7. To continuously promote the Slick Joint brand
  8. To cultivate iconic company culture.

LONG TERM GOALS

  1. To become renowned as a superb quick stop shop
  2. To achieve excellent operating best practices
  3. To examine scalability in contemplation of building a multi-unit or franchise-based network.

USE OF START-UP FUNDS

The Company requires $190,000 to complement the principal’s significant investment to execute start-up equipment, marketing, and working capital strategies. Per the following summary, a $105,000 investment has been provided by the principal and a $120,000 loan will be negotiated.


 

* Equipment includes coffee machine, food service equipment (toasters, microwave, fridges, coolers, dishwasher, etc.), counters, racks, prep tables, storage, etc., small wares, utensils, store fixtures/furniture, office/security, and miscellaneous store, including signs and/or banners/posters. ** Deposits are first and last on utilities and insurance *** LOAN - $120,000 amortized over 84 months at a rate of 6% (simple interest) yields a monthly payment of $1,753 – monthly interest and principal pay-down per the amortization schedule

 

SLICK JOINT EQUIPMENT WAREHOUSE 

LOCATION AND FACILITIES OF THE BUSINESS

The Greater Toronto Municipal Area (“GTMA”) features a population of almost 6 million people, with a 2011to 2016 annualized population growth rate of a robust 6.2%. Toronto is Canada’s largest city with a population above 2.8 million people. It is an economic powerhouse, with a business population of over 100,000 businesses. It was just reported that Toronto / the GTA has now surpassed 6 million residents. The GTA is renowned for its huge diversity in the economy, culture and vocations, and huge commercial presence. Toronto features excellent accessibility, to and from, and in and around the region, with several major highways and streets complemented by premiere air and rail facilities. All of the foregoing traits make Toronto and the GTA a “marketer’s dream, " a superb opportunity for obtaining prospects. Over the period of 2011 to 2017, the population growth rate in the GTA was a distinctive 6%. 43 Goldwin Ave, is in the high-density residential neighborhood of Weston – York, which is west-central Toronto. Other nearby neighborhoods include Weston, Rockcliffe-Smythe, Humber Heights, and Keelesdale, and the city of Etobicoke is also close by. The address is adjacent to the Chord Housing Co-op.

Company Operating Systems

The company’s systems needs are threefold: (1) a sales / POS / CSR management system (“SMS”), (2) business administration system (“BAS”) and online / “e-commerce capabilities for social media, marketing, e-mail, etc. (“E-System”). The SMS handles sales, POS, cash entries, and data. The BAS system handles client records and all business requisites, such as financial / bookkeeping, payroll, management reports, etc., and E-System handles marketing and communications, mobile management, etc. Numerous valid and market-proven systems are available, including, but definitely not limited to, Revel and Touch Bistro. The optimum operating capabilities provided will include:

  • CRM and ongoing goodwill programs
  • Client data records and client service records
  • Leads obtained from various marketing sources
  • Sales, costing, pricing, profitability
  • Purchasing, inventory, and waste
  • Internet, online functions, and “e-commerce”
  • Production of regular reports, including financial and online banking
  • Record keeping
  • Trending

SLICK JOINT PRODUCTS 

The menu will be casual flare and will feature key items such as:

  • Imagawayaki waffles
  • Empanadas
  • Mayo's mash potatoes
  • Japanese cheesecake
  • Chicken meat pie
  • Turkey meat pie
  • Parisian crustless french pie
  • Artisan Crustless Cheesecake
  • Banana Tart
  • Scotch Eggs
  • Beef meat pie and more.

The shop motto: “committed to the best food that fits well with a customer’s diet – fresh, natural and organic foods from a creative menu and foods that exceeds our customers’ expectations”. Also excelling at special events and occasions – weddings, custom cakes, anniversaries cakes, gift baskets, bread, pastries, and cupcakes - and accommodating deliveries, Slick Joint has built up a strong reputation and client goodwill.

COVID 19 – BUSINESS IMPACT 

The Covid 19 disruption is obviously causing negative economic impacts and some analysts are mentioning the possibility of a recession. Various experts are forecasting the demise of the virus to begin by late spring but others are anticipating by the end of summer, while others are even less optimistic. The current reality of the virus is that 81% of those who get it are mild cases, 13.8% need more intense treatment, and around 2% are likely to die. It is fact that the measures of governmental precautions and social distancing are now flattening the growth curve significantly. The ongoing warm weather may also act to discourage the virus. The impact on the company is difficult to absolutely determine, but it is logical to anticipate consumer confidence and the desire to make large financial commitments will be diminished, and many consumers may opt to defer larger projects. It is reasonable to assume these will fuel pent-up demand later in the year (a period of recovery). It is just reported that what appear to be viable vaccines are now in the test stage and could be implemented in reasonably short order. Some of the risks that the Covid 19 situation presents to the business are: (1) diminished sales (2) irregularities in staffing (3) disruption of some supply channels (4) skewing of the operating budget and cash flows and, (5) a safe working environment. The formulation of these projections is an opportunity for the company to do a strategies reality check and double-check its state of preparedness.

The company's "Covid 19 Action Plan"

1) The projection calls for reduced sales levels from Oct 2021 to Jan. 2022 - the company must work extra- hard at attracting sales via such things as networking, local flyers, "specials", intense social media use, and word-of-mouth.

2) The company will be proactive in promoting customer benefits and "do it now!" special offers.

3) The company will continue to establish goodwill and manage long-term and loyal client relationships and this asset will be conscientiously "mined" and word-of-mouth encouraged at every opportunity.

4) The company can consider such diversifications as on-demand, “e-services”, delivery/curbside, and special-ordered services

5) The company must have a "tightened belt" approach to variable costs.

6) The company will be vigilant in 'staying on top of “governmental” and community support (business and employee) assistance

7) Ownership needs to constantly and diligently watch sales trends, expenses, costs of materials and supplies, hours, and staff productivity at an unprecedented level - daily audits The nature of the company’s services challenges it to operate in a totally “arms-length” / socially distanced manner, strategically avoiding close interaction with clients wherever possible, and the company will be diligent in applying the protocols and procedures required to optimize execution of a safety-first agenda.

ANOTHER WAY YOU CAN SUPPORT OUR CAMPAIGN

You can also help by helping us promote the campaign and drop your enthusiasm comment on our campaign page.

story:
The Story

Hello! I'm Juan Diego and this is my story...  During this last crisis and after having a couple of glasses of wine, came up with uvaera product (I guess a lot of ideas come after having some wine) I'm seeking your help to bring this amazing product to life, we've tested the prototype and let me tell you it works amazingly well! So good, that we went and got our initial Patent Pending approval! With your help we can bring the product to market and let everyone really enjoy all the aromas and flavor of the wine. 

As an entrepreneur, nothing would be more satisfying for me and my family to have a product that people love, and be able to share the difference you taste when using uvaera to unleash your wine.  You will love the product! 

 

What We Need & What You Get

We are seeking $50,000 to cover many expenses but the biggest ones are:  The mold for mass producing  uvaera from food-grade FDA approved materials. With this amount we will also conform to the minimum units the factories asks for, as well as the minimum number of units for the packaging . Since we know the importance of getting the product in front of as many eyeballs as possible a good % will be used for online marketing as well as hiring a PR firm and a proven ad agency to get the product into magazines and other important media.  The $50,000 goal will also give us a jump start on salaries and scouting distributors around the 50 states in order to promote and sell our product to as many stores as possible. The first 100 backers will get a choice of the colors of their uvaera units. (limited edition version)

By supporting uvaera with $18.99 (the price of the product which contains 4 uvaera units to a box) you will be the first to get the uvaera product and taste the difference.

 

If we don't get to our goal, we will be covering our costs and the remainder will be donated to a non-profit organization that supports COVID research. We will be announcing the non-profit right here in our INDIEGOGO profile later on. 

 

With uvaera you will never have to wait for hours for your wine to finish aerating, you can just pop open a bottle, pour and swirl. In less than 30 seconds your wine will be perfect to enjoy it.  Once you get your uvaera please do this: Pour 2 glasses of wine, one with uvaera and one without. Swirl both glasses for 30 seconds and taste both of them.  You'll feel you're drinking from 2 different types of wines. 

 

Our goal is to create a revolution in aerating wine, the science is simple but people tend to over complicate things (like purchasing expensive decanters and pour-aerators) With your help we will achieve this. Less expensive wines will taste amazing and expensive wines will taste super expensive.

 

Risks & Challenges

We are currently researching factories where to produce the final product, since we want to achieve good pricing without sacrificing quality. This and the design of the packaging have been our biggest challenges so far. Moving forward we understand that our biggest challenge will be to get our product out to the market, to get people to know it exists and to get people to try it for themselves (you make a huge difference by letting your friends know about uvaera) and notice the amazing difference. That is why we  are assigning a good percentage of the funds to create a great marketing campaign and buy the most effective media to achieve our goals.

  • We will work hand in hand with the advertising company to make sure that every move goes with the essential core values and beliefs of uvaera.
  • We will also get in touch with well-known sommeliers to get expert feedback on our product and will post their comments right here on this site.

Other Ways You Can Help

You can also support us by letting your wine drinking friends know about uvaera :)

  • A small share on social media will make wonders for us, and it will be greatly appreciate it!
  • You can share easily using the INDIEGOGO share tools!

Thank you all for taking the time to read this. Thank you for your contribution/support. Thank you for your sharing. Thank you for being part of this journey with us!

story:
About us

The founder of Ekofungi, Mrs. Ivanka Milenkovic is a biologist and a mycologist. At the beginning of her career she has learned that science translated into practice is purposeful, and practice supported by science is successful, she stands by the belief that nature is the most perfect laboratory and that production that follows nature can only provide progress. Therefore, Ekofungi is based on these principles. Guided exclusively by the biological properties of fungi, very soon Ekofungi became a place of ZERO waste applied principle, and later an example of a real circular economy. Our production model, based on the open source model, is distributed to hundreds of entrepreneurs, who build their successful small business around the world based on the Ekofungi model.

 

 

Success story

One of the most remarkable successful Ekofungi students is Miss Chido Govera and her foundation The Future of Hope which networks and provides dignity and food to thousands of women in Zimbabwe and across Africa. We remain in touch with our students and together we weave a network of more humane progress and so we are together in this campaign.

 

 

 

 

Complete circular approach

Completing our cycle of production, as a necessary link we have introduced our local farmers, producers of organic vegetables. They make the most out of our already used substrate after growing mushrooms. We repurchase their aromatic products according to fair trade principles. Thanks to that, we have created a product that saves time, provides an ideal lunch for anyone who is in a rush and wants to eat perfectly healthy. Our product brings back scents of rustic sorts of vegetables and nature, which we think is the most important.

 

 

Our Premium Products

 

 

 

How to use EF premium products

 

 

Our problem

We have wrapped our knowledge, experience, positive energy and love into our bags of vegetable and mushrooms mixtures. Our knowledge and experience are great, but the opportunities to reach the end customer are not. Since we are a small company it is challenging to find support from any investors.

That is why we have decided to ask everyone who believes in true sustainability, not only declarative but applied and tangible, everyone who believes in the open source model, cooperation instead of competition and in everything that we are, to support us.

In order for our products, that exude quality and have a story, to reach the market where they belong, a sum of seven thousand euros is required.

To make sure that you can really experience the true quality of our product, with each payment you will receive a few bags to enjoy the scents of nature.

 

 

Our promise

With your support, we will have the ability to get to our consumers through world's largest shopping platforms. If our plan succeeds, and we manage to reach those goals, oyster mushrooms, produced by the Future of Hope foundation, will also find it's way to world's market, and will no longer be isolated.

We have wrapped our knowledge, experience, positive energy and love into our bags of vegetable and mushrooms mixtures. Our knowledge and experience are great, but the opportunities to reach the end customer are not. Since we are a small company it is challenging to find support from any investors.
That is why we have decided to ask everyone who believes in true sustainability, not only declarative but applied and tangible, everyone who believes in the open source model, cooperation instead of competition and in everything that we are, to support us.
In order for our products, that exude quality and have a story, to reach the market where they belong, a sum of seven thousand euros is required.
To make sure that you can really experience the true quality of our product, with each payment you will receive a few bags to enjoy the scents of nature.
 

 
Our promise
With your support, we will have the ability to get to our consumers through world's largest shopping platforms. If our plan succeeds, and we manage to reach those goals, oyster mushrooms, produced by the Future of Hope foundation, will also find it's way to world's market, and will no longer be isolated.

story:
Pigasus & Co was first dreamed up by husband and wife team, Joshua Boyd & Jayna Romine. We are finally ready to make the jump and make this dream a reality. We have multiple options for presale including merchandise, hot sauces, bbq parties, and more! We are totally open to partying it up Illinois if we can coincide it with our bbq tour we will be doing to Illinois in the Spring! We are so freakin excited to get started on this endeavor and are looking forward to all of you being a part of our story. Funds raised will first go to the smoker, and anything left over will go straight to the concession trailer fund! Merchandise and sauces will be sent out before the end of the year, all food stuffs and parties will be ready to rock in the spring.

Cheers, friends!

Josh, Jayna, Harrison, Garner, Warren

story:
Long Story Short

We wanted to make one of the oldest and healthiest cooking techniques - stone cooking - accessible to everyone. So, we created a stone pan with a little modern twist so it could be used anywhere and everywhere - from the heaters to straight on the dining table.

Healthy cooking. Delicious food. Long lasting. Retains heat. Eco-friendly materials. Good presentation. Even better price. 

 

The Bigger Picture

These days, in this fast-paced world, we are always in such a rush. Barely ever do we take the time to ourselves. From high-speed Internet, to fast food, to high-demand everything - we are always rushing through life when we really should be slowing down and enjoying it. 

So we, a group of food enthusiasts, teamed up with some of the best chefs in the world to create something that would help solve this problem of rushing. Something that would be your tool in healthy eating. Something that would allow you to use an ancient cooking method at home. Something that would bring the family together. Something that would impress your guests at your next backyard barbeque party. Something that would bring out your inner Betty Crocker even if you’re the worst chef in the world. And most importantly - something that would help you wind down and truly enjoy the food and company surrounding you.  

That something is Piedra Cocinar. A stone pan that takes us back to our roots and reminds us to slow down sometimes. 

Now, we know what you are thinking… What? Another cooking pan? Don’t we have enough of those on the market?

Well, this one is different. Isn’t that what they all say, though? But seriously. This pan takes us way back to our roots. 2000 years back. And reminds us to wind down, take our time, and enjoy the moment. 

Inspired by Mediterranean cooking and the Mediterranean lifestyle, we believe that every person should take the time to de-stress, slow down, and truly enjoy a home-cooked meal. Whether that would be every day or just once a week - Piedra Cocinar invites you to do that by helping you cook something truly special and keeping it warm for a long time.

Why Piedra Cocinar?

The Healthiest Way To Cook

It is well known that the Mediterranean diet is perhaps one of the healthiest diets in the world. From fighting inflammation, to reducing the risk for heart attack, stroke & Alzheimer’s disease, to encouraging healthy weight loss, to improving skin health - eating like a Mediterranean has been associated with endless health benefits.

Which is why we teamed up with the well-known chefs and Mediterranean food experts to bring the Piedra Cocinar project to life. Born in the small Spanish towns they continue their family cooking traditions that have been passed on generation to generation for hundreds of years. And their grandparents are living proof of the benefits of eating like a Mediterranean!

Mediterranean chef Santiago  - ‘’Yes, my grandma is over one hundred years old. She is still in good health and she is a very independent lady. And she still cooks daily. And what is most important - every time we sit around the table for a family dinner, she impresses us with something new. New aroma, new taste,’’ he smiles. ‘’Most people in our towns can expect to live longer, much longer than the World’s average’’.

 

It’s Not Another Cast Iron Skillet or Non-Stick Pan 

Don’t get confused here. The Piedra Cocinar pan is not just another cast iron skillet or non-stick pan. It is something completely different. It’s the thing you knew in the back of your head that your kitchen was missing. And once you try it, you won’t know how you ever lived without it! 

Unlike most pans and baking dishes, Piedra Cocinar is created with gabbro diabase (black marble) rather than metal or glass. Due to the thermal mass of the rock and the material's property food is less likely to burn on it.

Not to mention, for the first time in history, our Piedra Cocinar stone pans can be used anywhere and everywhere. It’s stone cooking taken to another level! The only exception - microwaves. But microwaves aren’t good for you anyway, so it’s a win-win. 

It Takes Us Back To Our Roots

Even though we would love to take all the credit, we can’t. We didn’t invent stone cooking - our ancestors did. All we did was make it accessible to everyone by creating a stone pan that can be used in any modern kitchen. And, we don’t want to brag, but we think it’s pretty awesome and our ancestors would be proud.

Created By Chefs

That pretty much says it all. You know, if it was created by chefs - it has to be good.

We are a team of Spanish and UK engineers, chefs, and food lovers. By combining all of our knowledge, we have designed a range of kitchenware so you could become a chef too - the Piedra Cocinar way.

Even if you don’t know how to cook, our team of in-house chefs creates picture-perfect food recipes weekly for you to try at home.



The Most Delicious Way To Cook

We believe that the best things come from simplicity - fire, stone, and organic groceries. You’d be surprised what a delicious and healthy combination these three components make. 

Not to mention, you can cook absolutely anything on Piedra Cocinar kitchenware. Unlike with barbeque grills where your possibilities are limited, food does not dry out on our stone pans. They are specially created to lock in all the healthy juices within the foods.

It Will Delight Your Guests

Not only will your guests be impressed with how good of a chef you are (wink, wink), but they will also be impressed by the presentation as well. 

Serve the food straight from a large “share la plancha” or separate “a piedra para cocinar” for each guest. 

It Helps You Slow Down And Enjoy The Moment

Since the stone stays warm for a while, the food will also stay hot and moist. So you can wind down, take your time, and enjoy your meal like a true Mediterranean. No rush!

No Artificial Coatings

It’s a well-known fact that overheated or scratched non-stick pans coated by PFOA or PFTE are toxic. In fact, birds die if they inhale PFTE. Humans can survive these intoxications, but the question is - do we want to? Just because we can survive doesn’t mean it’s not harmful. Just think about it - why buy expensive, organic groceries and toss them on to Perfluorooctanoic/Teflon coated pans? It doesn’t make sense.

We say no to artificial coatings and want to inspire you to do so too. The Piedra Cocinar kitchenware is eco-friendly, 100% recyclable, and artificial coating-free.

 

Handmade

Made from gabbro diabase stone, hardwood handles, and lots of love, the Piedra Cocinar kitchenware is completely handmade in the UK. No slavery or kids labour involved in our production run. Just lots of passion and love for high-quality kitchenware, and a lifetime guarantee!  

Expect these pans to be extremely long-lasting, as they are loaded with naturally-formed layers of metamorphic stone - which is composed of silt ore, shale, and volcanic ash compressed over millions of years. Not to mention, the hardwood handles are boiled in natural oils to give longevity, strength and to revive natural beauty. The result - a beautiful, eco-friendly, one-of-a-kind stone pan.

Please note this product is made from natural stone and wood, therefore you will find color and pattern variations in the stone and the wood due to the way the product is made. No two items are identical. Each and every item is unique.

We like to believe that local is the new luxury nowadays. Products developed in Third-world countries can be found everywhere and are often bad quality, while handmade items are rarer and made with love. 

Honestly Priced

We believe that a healthy lifestyle should be accessible to everyone. Which is why our kitchenware is honestly priced. No gimmicks. No BS. Just a truly great cooking experience. 

In fact, believe it or not, our one-of-a-kind products handmade with love are cheaper than the ones made in developing countries. Pretty crazy, huh? We think so too.

Why We Need Your Help

We need your help to buy more productive machinery in order to achieve even better quality products in larger quantities. This machinery, which would help us cut and assemble the Piedra Cocinar cooking stones, would allow us to reduce the prices and make our products even more affordable for everyone. Because when we say we believe everyone should be able to enjoy healthy meals on a daily basis - we mean it! 

Make every meal a celebration for your friends and family with Piedra Cocinar! 

 

Our Team

 

Risks and challenges

We have spent days and late evenings perfecting the design and usability, but as usual the most significant risk, as always, is timing. 
Sometimes things may go wrong that can’t plan for, but we are ready to face even unplanned challenges and ensure everything within our control and within promised timescale. 
To minimize the possibility of manufacturing setbacks and to ensure the quality meets our highest standards, we will continue to assemble Piedra Cocinar cooking stone in the UK.

story:
No jitters or hocus-pocus, just hours of crash-free focus. Discover Mushroom Cups!

This project is 85% funded by the Fund for Innovation of Small Businesses. Help us get the last 15% and bring our NEW products to life.

BENEFITS

FIRST TASTE REACTIONS

 

THE PROCESS

Important bioactive compounds are locked inside the mushroom cell walls (the walls are made of Chitin- one of the hardest natural materials on earth that cannot be digested).  Consequently, grinding mushrooms in the powder wouldn't get the job done. In order to unlock all of their potency Chitin needs to be removed:

 

OUR PRODUCTS

Finest Gourmet Coffee infused with Wid and Organic mushrooms for less than 1$ per Cup!


Finest, Peruvian, Organic, Gourmet Coffee - in ALL of our Products


Wild Mediterranean Chanterelles - in ALL of our products​


Lions’ Mane mushroom contains two specific compounds hericerins and erinacines, which support Brain Function and are the only thing on the planet with a fascinating ability to regrow nerve cells.  

 



Infused with Chaga extract (known as the mushroom of immortality) this blend will be perfect for those looking for strong anti-inflammatory, anti-viral properties, and extra protection against aging.

 



Cordyceps is a go-to mushroom for storming through an exhausting day. Widely accepted in professional athletes’ circles as a great natural remedy used to increase cellular bio-energy & improve oxygen uptake/aerobic capacity. This blend will come in handy for those who live and breathe the sport and active lifestyle.

 

SMALL BUSINESS SUPORTING SMALL BUSINESSES

With your purchase, you are supporting more than 80 certified mushroom hunters, and their families,
These kind, nature-loving people are using the blade cut methodology to sustainably harvest wild chanterelles and bringing them to your tables while preserving the forest eco-system.

 

INGREDIENTS

TASTING NOTES

MUSHROOMS





COMPARISON



Handmade Coffee Cups

WHAT DO WE CARE ABOUT?

According to National Geographic over the past 15 years, bee colonies have been disappearing in what is known as the "colony collapse disorder," and some regions have seen losses of up to 90%.

Every few months we hear disastrous stories from the shocked beekeepers who wake up in the morning and find hundreds of dead bees in front of their hives. 

The reasons are highly infectious viruses transferred by varroa mites. The most dangerous and deadly one is the one causing the deformed wing - the deformed wing virus (DWV). This DWV removes bee's ability to fly, undermines their immune system, and halves their lifespan.

Luckily a recent study showed that Amadou (Fomes) and Reishi (Ganoderma) extract fed to honey bees greatly reduces virus levels. These fungi extracts reduced DWV more than 800-fold in the first trial, showing a huge potential this medicine has. 

It is obvious - Bees need mushrooms too. So for the past 6 months, we have been making mushroom-infused syrup for bees in need. With this sirup, viruses brought by varroa mites will hopefully become just a small inconvenience for the empowered and happy bees. 

 

 

*Music from the video attributed to Artistic organization Kabinet, Roses1401, SONGSTICKS, eeszsa and theojt.

story:
We believe in serving food that we would feed our children. That’s why, when we opened Oasis Vegetarian Café in 1996, we vowed to provide our community with delicious, accessible, plant-based food. Being family-owned, we believe in operating a thriving business with integrity. Our driving force is love - for service and for good food. For over 20 years, we’ve watched our family, our community, and our business grow and evolve. Now more than ever, our mission is clear, and we believe it is vital to the health of our community.

Oasis is re-launching! We need our community's support to make much needed improvements and optimize our customer experience. 

 

Our family has been operating Oasis without major renovations for the past 20 years. We have reached a point where our customer growth has far exceeded our ability to serve at a level we feel our customers deserve. We need a total inside-out restaurant transformation. Reaching our goal of $50,000 will allow us to remodel our indoor dining area and implement a much-needed kitchen renovation. We would like to purchase new chairs and tables, and create a more welcoming ambiance for our dine-in customers. Some of the major components of the kitchen renovation include; rebuilding our storefront order window for more efficient customer service, repairing or replacing all major commercial appliances (refrigerators/ovens/grills/drink dispensers/juicer etc.), fully repairing our commercial walk-in refrigerator (it's been used for storage for over 10 years!), and installing a new dishwashing system and sink so we can reuse real plates and silverware for dine-in orders. We also plan to increase our customer service and back-of-the-house staff to better support our increasing growth. Although we have a big goal, if we don't reach it, any amount of support will go towards enough of this renovation as we can possibly afford. 

 

Your contribution and support in making this goal a reality will dramatically improve the quality, speed, and efficiency of our service to you and the community. This much needed boost will play a big role in the development of our company. Our big vision is to expand to multiple Inland Empire locations over the next few years, and this re-launch marks the beginning of that vision. 

Now that our family team has come together to make this mission a reality, we feel more confident than ever that our collective talents and abilities will allow us to improve and grow Oasis to a level never reached before. 

As we complete the improvements necessary for our current location, excess funds will be utilized for the opening of an upcoming second location that we are excited to announce very soon. All of this will be made possible with the continued support from our customers and the community.

We appreciate any and all support. Check out our incredible perks, too! Please share this campaign with anyone who loves Oasis or aligns with our mission. The IndieGoGo share tools are a super-easy way to get the word out. Thank you and we LOVE you!

 

Why change?

 

Oasis has been a favorite for over 20 years. Why change? Put simply, times change. Information changes, as do the studies and findings that determine what truly nourishes us and helps us thrive.  We felt compelled to change our menu because we realized that improvements could be made in quality and consciousness. In recent years, we’ve discovered that highly processed veggie meats, GMO ingredients, and conventionally-grown vegetables can be detrimental to our family, and our customer’s health. We couldn’t possibly continue doing honest business knowing this. That’s when we decided to upgrade our menu to items we make ourselves; that way, we know EXACTLY what they’re made of! Now, we know we are serving you wholesome, healthy, and fresh plant-based cuisine. We make everything from scratch in-house, daily. We’ve requested that our suppliers bring us produce daily, so we can promise our customers the best and freshest ingredients possible. Everything is sourced with integrity and is non-GMO, organic when possible, and some ingredients are even sourced right in our very own neighborhood! So...why change? Well, how couldn’t we?

 

How have we changed?

 

Specifically, how have we changed? Previously, our menu was a plethora of Central-American classics, burgers, burritos, and a variety of drinks. We offered a variety of veggie meat substitutes that are created in factories and boast a long list of unpronounceable ingredients. We offered fried foods that you can get at any old fast-food joint like onion rings and fries. We made lots of things in house, but outsourced quite a bit of product. Although people loved our old menu, we struggled in our small kitchen to keep up with the vast menu and deeply knew that we could do and serve better.  

 

We’ve changed our menu to be systemised and streamlined, yet customizable and fun. Customers select their vessel, so-to-speak, whether it be a bowl, burrito, salad, burger, or tacos, then, step-by-step, select the protein, veggie, and sauce to top it off. Our customers can find their favorite combination inspired-by their old-menu favorite or select a new combination every time they visit! Now, every option in every category is homemade. Our classic vegan steak, now named “carnitas,” has always been a favorite, our eggs are organic, our tofu is hand-marinated, non-GMO, and organic, and our Oasis Patty is our signature gluten-free veggie patty. Each of our veggie selections are delicious and our four new sauces are incredible. From our hearty and savory Red Pepper Sauce to our light and fresh Maple Herb Vinaigrette, we’ve got a sauce to fit every palate.

 

Instead of pre-combined dishes like our “Steak Burger” or “Portobello Wrap,” our customers can now build their own favorites with our Garlic Herb Mushrooms or Carnitas. Since our menu is more streamlined, we can now focus on bringing out delicious and fresh flavors. The energy and resources we spent on fried foods and pre-made products is now redirected to preparing fresh ingredients like herbs, veggies, and fruits. Even our drinks and smoothies are made with whole fruits and veggies and sweetened naturally. Food preparation time has increased, but it’s worth it! As time goes on, wait times will decrease because of the simplified and streamlined menu.

 

Long-time customers will notice a streamlined approach to our prices as well. $9 for a dish and $13 for a meal may seem different from what they’re accustomed to, but if they value our improvements and their health (and consider the average prices for a meal WITHOUT integrity in the area) they’ll realize that it simply makes sense. And, to avoid a picket line, we’ve kept some long-time favorite items like pupusas, tamales, and corn dog with that magic yellow sauce on a Classics menu.

 

Oh, and our homemade hot sauce isn’t going anywhere anytime soon.
story_txt:
We believe in serving food that we would feed our children. That’s why, when we opened Oasis Vegetarian Café in 1996, we vowed to provide our community with delicious, accessible, plant-based food. Being family-owned, we believe in operating a thriving business with integrity. Our driving force is love - for service and for good food. For over 20 years, we’ve watched our family, our community, and our business grow and evolve. Now more than ever, our mission is clear, and we believe it is vital to the health of our community.

Oasis is re-launching! We need our community's support to make much needed improvements and optimize our customer experience. 
 

Our family has been operating Oasis without major renovations for the past 20 years. We have reached a point where our customer growth has far exceeded our ability to serve at a level we feel our customers deserve. We need a total inside-out restaurant transformation. Reaching our goal of $50,000 will allow us to remodel our indoor dining area and implement a much-needed kitchen renovation. We would like to purchase new chairs and tables, and create a more welcoming ambiance for our dine-in customers. Some of the major components of the kitchen renovation include; rebuilding our storefront order window for more efficient customer service, repairing or replacing all major commercial appliances (refrigerators/ovens/grills/drink dispensers/juicer etc.), fully repairing our commercial walk-in refrigerator (it's been used for storage for over 10 years!), and installing a new dishwashing system and sink so we can reuse real plates and silverware for dine-in orders. We also plan to increase our customer service and back-of-the-house staff to better support our increasing growth. Although we have a big goal, if we don't reach it, any amount of support will go towards enough of this renovation as we can possibly afford. 
 

Your contribution and support in making this goal a reality will dramatically improve the quality, speed, and efficiency of our service to you and the community. This much needed boost will play a big role in the development of our company. Our big vision is to expand to multiple Inland Empire locations over the next few years, and this re-launch marks the beginning of that vision. 
Now that our family team has come together to make this mission a reality, we feel more confident than ever that our collective talents and abilities will allow us to improve and grow Oasis to a level never reached before. 
As we complete the improvements necessary for our current location, excess funds will be utilized for the opening of an upcoming second location that we are excited to announce very soon. All of this will be made possible with the continued support from our customers and the community.

We appreciate any and all support. Check out our incredible perks, too! Please share this campaign with anyone who loves Oasis or aligns with our mission. The IndieGoGo share tools are a super-easy way to get the word out. Thank you and we LOVE you!
 
Why change? Oasis has been a favorite for over 20 years. Why change? Put simply, times change. Information changes, as do the studies and findings that determine what truly nourishes us and helps us thrive.  We felt compelled to change our menu because we realized that improvements could be made in quality and consciousness. In recent years, we’ve discovered that highly processed veggie meats, GMO ingredients, and conventionally-grown vegetables can be detrimental to our family, and our customer’s health. We couldn’t possibly continue doing honest business knowing this. That’s when we decided to upgrade our menu to items we make ourselves; that way, we know EXACTLY what they’re made of! Now, we know we are serving you wholesome, healthy, and fresh plant-based cuisine. We make everything from scratch in-house, daily. We’ve requested that our suppliers bring us produce daily, so we can promise our customers the best and freshest ingredients possible. Everything is sourced with integrity and is non-GMO, organic when possible, and some ingredients are even sourced right in our very own neighborhood! So...why change? Well, how couldn’t we? How have we changed? Specifically, how have we changed? Previously, our menu was a plethora of Central-American classics, burgers, burritos, and a variety of drinks. We offered a variety of veggie meat substitutes that are created in factories and boast a long list of unpronounceable ingredients. We offered fried foods that you can get at any old fast-food joint like onion rings and fries. We made lots of things in house, but outsourced quite a bit of product. Although people loved our old menu, we struggled in our small kitchen to keep up with the vast menu and deeply knew that we could do and serve better.   We’ve changed our menu to be systemised and streamlined, yet customizable and fun. Customers select their vessel, so-to-speak, whether it be a bowl, burrito, salad, burger, or tacos, then, step-by-step, select the protein, veggie, and sauce to top it off. Our customers can find their favorite combination inspired-by their old-menu favorite or select a new combination every time they visit! Now, every option in every category is homemade. Our classic vegan steak, now named “carnitas,” has always been a favorite, our eggs are organic, our tofu is hand-marinated, non-GMO, and organic, and our Oasis Patty is our signature gluten-free veggie patty. Each of our veggie selections are delicious and our four new sauces are incredible. From our hearty and savory Red Pepper Sauce to our light and fresh Maple Herb Vinaigrette, we’ve got a sauce to fit every palate. Instead of pre-combined dishes like our “Steak Burger” or “Portobello Wrap,” our customers can now build their own favorites with our Garlic Herb Mushrooms or Carnitas. Since our menu is more streamlined, we can now focus on bringing out delicious and fresh flavors. The energy and resources we spent on fried foods and pre-made products is now redirected to preparing fresh ingredients like herbs, veggies, and fruits. Even our drinks and smoothies are made with whole fruits and veggies and sweetened naturally. Food preparation time has increased, but it’s worth it! As time goes on, wait times will decrease because of the simplified and streamlined menu. Long-time customers will notice a streamlined approach to our prices as well. $9 for a dish and $13 for a meal may seem different from what they’re accustomed to, but if they value our improvements and their health (and consider the average prices for a meal WITHOUT integrity in the area) they’ll realize that it simply makes sense. And, to avoid a picket line, we’ve kept some long-time favorite items like pupusas, tamales, and corn dog with that magic yellow sauce on a Classics menu. Oh, and our homemade hot sauce isn’t going anywhere anytime soon.

story:
Welcome to Okanogan Gold

Our names are Terry and Tammy Taylor and with half of our vision coming through by completing our recreational Marijuana Gardens we would like for You to witness first hand what nature can do. With our endless supplyof Okanogan river water and rich soil, We produce some of the largest Marijuana plants around sitting on one of the most beautiful settings in Eastern Washington. 

With the combination of these things, we believe the concept of a cannabis friendly hotel and restaurant (no infused foods) would work perfect. You could come and stay among the many gardens there are to tour. We offer plantation  and extraction tours presently with clinics and hands on participation for those who are 21 years of age. We also offer dry camping (we do not supply for consumption but there are many recreational  Marijuana stores in the area) Restaurant and Hotel would not have an age limit as long as they are not in the rooms overlooking the gardens, This gives you the chance to enjoy the river with your family swimming, boating or fishing. 

Let master grower Terry answer all of your questions and then let me, Tammy, take care of all your hospitality needs. Imagine beautiful hotel rooms overlooking the cannabis gardens and some with river view. We would have many cannabis friendly smoking areas and if you get hungry,we could accommodate that too, with our own restaurant and bar. We believe this would attract many customers if promoted correctly. We  have good Branding that could transfer easily to the resort. See us on YouTube, Facebook and Instagram.

Our campaign involves stages. Our first stage is to raise money to buy a food truck or trailer that we could use to feed our present customers, campers and employees.  We would like to serve many delicious dishes including Pho prepared with fresh vegetables grown on the farm and local meats. Second and third stages will be building the hotel, restaurant and bar.

We have always thought we had a beautiful place and that a hotel and restaurant would work here. With being on the river and the mountains close, it's a perfect place to stay. There's even a world class golf course 20 minutes away. Now, with the legalization of marijuana in our beautiful state of Washington, and, our opportunity to have a license to grow is all the more reason to believe we have the perfect place and opportunity and it is knocking at our door.

Our contributors could help us finalize a dream my Husband and I have had for years. We have worked very hard to get where we are and now could use a little help getting finished up. We believe $50,000.00 would buy our food trailer with start up costs and permits.  That would give us the push we need to complete our stages.  Any amount can be important so if you are not interested in our perks but would still like to be part of a ground floor type of resort please feel free to donate any amount. Our campaign will keep all money put towards our goal because it will get us that much closer. If you can not donate please help out with sharing our campaign...Please share on all your social media and to all your friends.

Thank you for your consideration,

                                                                 Sincerely,

                                                                        Terry and Tammy Taylor

                                                                                Okanogan Gold

story:
My Story

My name is Karen O'Connell, I am an Australian native and I have been living in Southern California now for 16 years. I landed on US shores to help with the launch of a telecommunications company named Boost Mobile. I played an integral marketing role in the launch and roll out of the Australian, New Zealand and the USA markets. I know what it takes to build things from scratch and bring ideas from concept stage through to execution.

I am a single Mother with two daughters aged 12 and 10, and have lived an active healthy lifestyle from a very young age. I have always excelled athletically and currently love to run, cycle, do yoga, ski, and you might even catch me surfing a Wavestorm, or competing in a Spartan Race.

I love to challenge myself in all areas of life and continually push myself to test my limits. I also know what it's like to overcome life's obstacles along the way, and I've certainly been dealt my fair share. Metaphorically speaking, I live and breathe "Crank and Grind", I understand success is not achieved without being knocked over a few times, or from lack of hard work.

My other passions are experiencing great coffee and great food. Yes, I would consider myself a "foodie" and eating a clean healthy diet is important to me, along with teaching my children the importance of adopting life long habits as it pertains to food and activity.

I have also made it my mission to continually educate "American's" on what good coffee should taste like, and steer them away from choosing milkshake containers of coffee, loaded up with  sugary syrups.

In 2007 I co-founded a bicycle retail chain named Bike Religion, and even though I enjoy cycling, selling and servicing bikes was not my passion. When the 3rd Bike Religion retail location opened up in Dana Point in 2012, my Australian partners and I seized an opportunity to open up a specialty coffee shop located in the same space and capitalize on serving great coffee and clean healthy foods influenced by our Aussie culture.

I spearheaded the launch of Crank and Grind  to open its doors on June 8, 2013 and within a few short months sold out of the bicycle business to become the sole proprietor of Crank and Grind. Cycling and coffee is not a foreign concept to Australians but to an iconic surf community like Dana Point they couldn't understand how we could possibly serve "good coffee" inside of a bike store. It has taken many years of enticing them to shift their mindsets but once they decide to step inside our doors, they are pleasantly surprised.

My vision for Crank and Grind is to merge specialty coffee with a healthy active lifestyle! Whilst my brand may have began tied to a bicycle retailer, I see Crank and Grind evolving to be the coffee shop brand tied to health, wellness and other sporting activities like surfing or OCR and using my retail shops and product portfolio as a platform to strengthen community in varying lifestyle and sporting cultures.

 

My growth has averaged 30% year over year and still gaining much momentum but I now face the challenge of not having the capital to take it to another level and achieve my vision and ultimate goal.

 

 

Current Financial Needs:

I am currently seeking $100,000 in funding which will contribute to the following areas:-

1. Paying off high interest unsecured small business loans that impact current cash flow

2. Ongoing operating capital to cover retail location rent and payroll

3. New merchandise production costs ie. t.shirts, hats, drinking vessels

4. Product portfolio costs to include packaging design, website integration, marketing, and initial production costs

 

How Your Contributions Will Help:

In contributing to my campaign, you will enable me to continue to push forward to achieve my brand vision and goals, and relieve some stress of worrying about how I can get my business through the next week.

I believe in my vision and my abilities. I am not one to give up easy. I have persevered solely for 4 years and I am equipped with a great brand, the knowledge, the experience, the network and a proven concept and track record of successfully launching a business, products and brands. I just need the funding to keep me moving forward in a positive direction.

This is important to me because I believe I can strengthen community, provide a platform and a bridge that connects varying lifestyle and sporting cultures and help "Americans" adopt healthier habits with respect to how they consume coffee. I will continue to educate all generations on the health benefits of making better food and beverage choices to enhance an individuals overall health and well being to ultimately live healthier, longer lives.

 

Other Ways You Can Help:

I appreciate you taking the time to listen to my vision for Crank and Grind and I would be grateful for you to share my story with your network of people who can help me achieve my goal.

I can no longer do this on my own! I need your help and the help of other like minded individuals who have the means to make a contribution one way or another.

Thank you for considering this opportunity in helping me make a difference! I hope you will follow my progress and watch my growth as I continue to push forward, one crank at a time.

Yours Sincerely,

-Karen O'Connell

story:
I AM WATER DROP™

“Water is my client” – Tanja Andrejasic Wechsler

Dear Friends,

Thank you for taking the time to read about I AM WATER DROP. Growing up in Slovenia, I was fortunate to spend much of my childhood by water streams observing water in its most pristine form as it originated from the ground of the forest. I saw that I was one with the rest of nature, that everything was interconnected, and that my humanity depended on staying connected to that primordial sacred place of life.

Already as a child, I worried that we would run out of clean water. Later in life I realized how extensively ignorance and greed are damaging our environment and that healing the waters requires more than the few superficial efforts to repair the damages we created. A more permanent solution requires us to resolve the problem in our current thinking, which is that we see ourselves separated from the rest of nature. I became convinced that it was essential to bring sensitivity to and respect for water to the “public” to help heal our physical, spiritual, and emotional separation from the rest of nature and to point out the falsity of water privatization and abuse.

As a philosopher and engineer, I decided to create a bottle with a strong social mission and to campaign for a more enlightened humanity by teaching about water and by offering an alternative to current water containers and the related marketing experience. I AM WATER DROP™ is a beautiful, natural water-drop shaped bottle created to inspire a more ecological humanity by promoting our relationship with the rest of nature and the delicacy of water that supports life. 

 

____________________________________________________

 

I AM WATER DROP™: A LEAP FORWARD IN DESIGN

 

 

I AM WATER DROP™ is an innovative concept and organic, nature-inspired design that offers a better alternative​ ​to​ other water containers in ​today's bottled water market. Through our design we aspire to:

Honor Water With How We Serve It

I AM WATER DROP™ is made out of durable glass and represents the profound beauty of the natural elements and energies in water. We based the shape on Viktor Schauberger’s theory of Sacred Living Geometry; that states the inherent movement, energy and life of water, like nature, is best supported, sustained and preserved in an egg-like shape.

Create Beauty That Starts A Conversation  

We believe that water is beautiful and we wanted our bottle to live up to that beauty. The bottle’s asymmetrical shape emulates the natural form (a droplet) that water takes and is both true to water and beautiful to perceive. It’s our hope that this design catches consumers’ attention, and drives a bigger conversation around water. 

 

I AM WATER DROP™: 
AN HONEST APPROACH TO SERVING WATER

No​ ​problem​ ​can​ ​be​ ​solved​ ​from​ ​the​ ​same​ ​level​ ​of​ ​consciousness​ ​that​ ​created​ ​it." ​​
​–​ ​Albert​ ​Einstein

We see an opportunity to seed I AM WATER DROP™ in high-end markets. By coupling the aesthetics of our bottle with the experience upscale hotels, resorts, spas, and restaurants aim to provide their customers, we hope to create momentum with key influencers, while giving these luxury companies an opportunity to demonstrate the commitment they’ve made to care for the environment. 

 

I AM WATER DROP™:
A STEP TOWARD CONNECTION AND INTEGRAL THINKING

"Understanding water is the fastest way to raise the consciousness of humanity and resolve our ecological problems." -- Tanja Andrejasic Wechsler

I AM WATER DROP™ appeals to the large and growing population of people who are water-conscious and committed to purchasing products that contribute to the environment instead of degrading it.

I AM WATER DROP™ is prompting a shift in thinking and behavior by uniquely promoting a greater understanding of water and our interconnectivity. The educational materials that accompany the bottle will build more conscious consumers and citizens of the world. Overall, the message in the bottle’s design conveys that the only viable, healthy solution is to sustain and respect nature’s equilibrium.

Businesses and consumers using I AM WATER DROP™ are not just buying a water bottle but are building a community of people who are dedicated to social issues, justice, and water preservation. 

 

I AM WATER DROP™:
A STEP TOWARD EDUCATION AND RESTORATION

“Water is the source of life and its essential purpose is to continue creation."

Centered around the vision of a sustainable environment, I AM WATER DROP™ seeks to change our habits and way of thinking through knowledge about water scarcity and quality. 

We have made a voluntary commitment as part of the 2017 UN Ocean Stewardship to preserving and cleaning our oceans. Plans to maintain our commitment include supporting Plastic Bank (plasticbank.org) by dedicating a percentage of the sales from each I AM WATER DROP™ bottle, which will translate into the recycling and processing of approximately 400 to 700 discarded plastic bottles for every bottle sold. 

In addition, sales of the bottle will be applied toward education about water and water rights as well as toward supporting water restoration projects such as removal of plastic from the ocean. 

Ready to Launch

I AM WATER DROP was conceived years ago, but it took much effort to push through current limitations of mass producing glass in an organic art form, which was an important part of the mission. Over the course of this journey, I spent almost all of my personal funds, working with different designers and glass studios to achieve the design and finetune the engineering details.

I have now pulled together an amazing team comprising one of the best glass blowers in the world, engineering designers, and a branding team. The bottle has now reached the ultimate integrity in design, materials and mission. We have patiently and lovingly nurtured I AM WATER DROP™ from the initial stage of conception to this current phase and we hope to launch in the next month and to invite investors.

Expected costs for this essential pre-production stage, which includes a small run  of 100 of the bottle, package and silicone design and sampling, are more than I am able to cover. We need $30,000 now in order to produce and show the first samples to investors and potential buyers.

For our next phase we will need approximately $100,000 to cover the costs of the final tooling and silicone production; brand development, including the logo; final packaging design and creation; and marketing, including the sales team.

I know that many of you care deeply about water issues and I would like to invite you to join the mission of I AM WATER DROP™ and help support us at this important stage so that we can present the bottle to investors and potential buyers.

This campaign is also about uniting and offering like-minded individuals who share concern about the state of the world today--especially WATER, the source of life-- an opportunity to form a community that supports, financially and/or in spirit, the creation of a better world and a more enlightened and connected humanity.

It is my hope that I AM WATER DROP™ is brought soon to today's bottled water market so that it can begin to inspire and serve to help change practices. I AM WATER DROP™ is water speaking to us -- reminding us of our lost connection and holding us accountable for our actions.

To join us, please support I AM WATER DROP™ with a donation. We also welcome your help by asking you to share this campaign via your social media connections, networks, email and word of mouth, and by also encouraging your friends and colleagues to support us or spread the word. Press inquiries are also welcome. If you would like to be notified about the launch of the bottle or become a Friendraiser, please submit your email. 

 

I AM WATER DROP™:
A TRIBUTE TO BEAUTY THAT SUPPORTS ECOLOGICAL EFFORTS

“Beauty will save the world”
― Fyodor Dostoyevsky

Ultimately, I AM WATER DROP™, a beautiful nature-inspired bottle designed to inspire, educate and restore water, will help create a shift in the way we think about each other and water by bringing a real and honest approach and commitment to serving water.

Thank you again for your interest in I AM WATER DROP™. We hope you will join us in bringing this inspirational and educational bottle to the world.

Tanja Andrejasic Wechsler

______________________________________________________

About Designer:

 

Tanja Andrejasic Wechsler, the founder of Our Humanity Matters, is dedicated to inspiring a more enlightened and sustainable humanity that understands all life is connected and interdependent. She is a systemic thinker whose efforts are creating a paradigm shift in public awareness of interconnectivity with one another and the rest of nature through the systems of communication and connectivity; mass media, products and water.

She believes that media and messaging has become part of the nervous system of global society and must reflect our highest values and aspirations and further the connection to the rest of life, which humanity is an intricate part.

Tanja was born in Slovenia where she completed Mechanical Engineering School and a rigid study in Philosophy with world-renowned philosophers with emphasis on psychoanalysis at the Slovenian Academy of Sciences and Arts. She received an MA in Media from the New School University in NYC were her mentor Paul Ryan deepened her understanding in Ecology and its relationship to mind and media.

A more permanent solution requires us to resolve the problem in our current thinking, which is that we see ourselves separated from the rest of nature. I became convinced that it was essential to bring sensitivity to and respect for water to the “public” to help heal our physical, spiritual, and emotional separation from the rest of nature and to point out the falsity of water privatization and abuse.
As a philosopher and engineer, I decided to create a bottle with a strong social mission and to campaign for a more enlightened humanity by teaching about water and by offering an alternative to current water containers and the related marketing experience. I AM WATER DROP™ is a beautiful, natural water-drop shaped bottle created to inspire a more ecological humanity by promoting our relationship with the rest of nature and the delicacy of water that supports life. 

 

____________________________________________________
 

I AM WATER DROP™: A LEAP FORWARD IN DESIGN
 

 
I AM WATER DROP™ is an innovative concept and organic, nature-inspired design that offers a better alternative​ ​to​ other water containers in ​today's bottled water market. Through our design we aspire to:
Honor Water With How We Serve It
I AM WATER DROP™ is made out of durable glass and represents the profound beauty of the natural elements and energies in water. We based the shape on Viktor Schauberger’s theory of Sacred Living Geometry; that states the inherent movement, energy and life of water, like nature, is best supported, sustained and preserved in an egg-like shape.
Create Beauty That Starts A Conversation  
We believe that water is beautiful and we wanted our bottle to live up to that beauty. The bottle’s asymmetrical shape emulates the natural form (a droplet) that water takes and is both true to water and beautiful to perceive. It’s our hope that this design catches consumers’ attention, and drives a bigger conversation around water. 
 

I AM WATER DROP™: AN HONEST APPROACH TO SERVING WATER
No​ ​problem​ ​can​ ​be​ ​solved​ ​from​ ​the​ ​same​ ​level​ ​of​ ​consciousness​ ​that​ ​created​ ​it." ​​​–​ ​Albert​ ​Einstein

We see an opportunity to seed I AM WATER DROP™ in high-end markets. By coupling the aesthetics of our bottle with the experience upscale hotels, resorts, spas, and restaurants aim to provide their customers, we hope to create momentum with key influencers, while giving these luxury companies an opportunity to demonstrate the commitment they’ve made to care for the environment. 
 

I AM WATER DROP™:A STEP TOWARD CONNECTION AND INTEGRAL THINKING
"Understanding water is the fastest way to raise the consciousness of humanity and resolve our ecological problems." -- Tanja Andrejasic Wechsler

I AM WATER DROP™ appeals to the large and growing population of people who are water-conscious and committed to purchasing products that contribute to the environment instead of degrading it.
I AM WATER DROP™ is prompting a shift in thinking and behavior by uniquely promoting a greater understanding of water and our interconnectivity. The educational materials that accompany the bottle will build more conscious consumers and citizens of the world. Overall, the message in the bottle’s design conveys that the only viable, healthy solution is to sustain and respect nature’s equilibrium.
Businesses and consumers using I AM WATER DROP™ are not just buying a water bottle but are building a community of people who are dedicated to social issues, justice, and water preservation. 
 
I AM WATER DROP™:A STEP TOWARD EDUCATION AND RESTORATION
“Water is the source of life and its essential purpose is to continue creation."

Centered around the vision of a sustainable environment, I AM WATER DROP™ seeks to change our habits and way of thinking through knowledge about water scarcity and quality. 
We have made a voluntary commitment as part of the 2017 UN Ocean Stewardship to preserving and cleaning our oceans. Plans to maintain our commitment include supporting Plastic Bank (plasticbank.org) by dedicating a percentage of the sales from each I AM WATER DROP™ bottle, which will translate into the recycling and processing of approximately 400 to 700 discarded plastic bottles for every bottle sold. 
In addition, sales of the bottle will be applied toward education about water and water rights as well as toward supporting water restoration projects such as removal of plastic from the ocean. 
Ready to Launch
I AM WATER DROP was conceived years ago, but it took much effort to push through current limitations of mass producing glass in an organic art form, which was an important part of the mission. Over the course of this journey, I spent almost all of my personal funds, working with different designers and glass studios to achieve the design and finetune the engineering details.
I have now pulled together an amazing team comprising one of the best glass blowers in the world, engineering designers, and a branding team. The bottle has now reached the ultimate integrity in design, materials and mission. We have patiently and lovingly nurtured I AM WATER DROP™ from the initial stage of conception to this current phase and we hope to launch in the next month and to invite investors.
Expected costs for this essential pre-production stage, which includes a small run  of 100 of the bottle, package and silicone design and sampling, are more than I am able to cover. We need $30,000 now in order to produce and show the first samples to investors and potential buyers.
For our next phase we will need approximately $100,000 to cover the costs of the final tooling and silicone production; brand development, including the logo; final packaging design and creation; and marketing, including the sales team.
I know that many of you care deeply about water issues and I would like to invite you to join the mission of I AM WATER DROP™ and help support us at this important stage so that we can present the bottle to investors and potential buyers.
This campaign is also about uniting and offering like-minded individuals who share concern about the state of the world today--especially WATER, the source of life-- an opportunity to form a community that supports, financially and/or in spirit, the creation of a better world and a more enlightened and connected humanity.
It is my hope that I AM WATER DROP™ is brought soon to today's bottled water market so that it can begin to inspire and serve to help change practices. I AM WATER DROP™ is water speaking to us -- reminding us of our lost connection and holding us accountable for our actions.
To join us, please support I AM WATER DROP™ with a donation. We also welcome your help by asking you to share this campaign via your social media connections, networks, email and word of mouth, and by also encouraging your friends and colleagues to support us or spread the word. Press inquiries are also welcome. If you would like to be notified about the launch of the bottle or become a Friendraiser, please submit your email. 
 
I AM WATER DROP™:A TRIBUTE TO BEAUTY THAT SUPPORTS ECOLOGICAL EFFORTS
“Beauty will save the world”― Fyodor Dostoyevsky

Ultimately, I AM WATER DROP™, a beautiful nature-inspired bottle designed to inspire, educate and restore water, will help create a shift in the way we think about each other and water by bringing a real and honest approach and commitment to serving water.
Thank you again for your interest in I AM WATER DROP™. We hope you will join us in bringing this inspirational and educational bottle to the world.
Tanja Andrejasic Wechsler
______________________________________________________
About Designer:
 
Tanja Andrejasic Wechsler, the founder of Our Humanity Matters, is dedicated to inspiring a more enlightened and sustainable humanity that understands all life is connected and interdependent. She is a systemic thinker whose efforts are creating a paradigm shift in public awareness of interconnectivity with one another and the rest of nature through the systems of communication and connectivity; mass media, products and water.
She believes that media and messaging has become part of the nervous system of global society and must reflect our highest values and aspirations and further the connection to the rest of life, which humanity is an intricate part.
Tanja was born in Slovenia where she completed Mechanical Engineering School and a rigid study in Philosophy with world-renowned philosophers with emphasis on psychoanalysis at the Slovenian Academy of Sciences and Arts. She received an MA in Media from the New School University in NYC were her mentor Paul Ryan deepened her understanding in Ecology and its relationship to mind and media.

story:
The Story

The Source is an unbakery specializing in raw cakes, bliss balls, and a variety of other raw and good for you desserts.  We are also the owners of Rawmond Milk and continue to produce and sell our raw almond milk.

Since the beginning, we've put our hearts and souls into the products we produce. We take every effort to make sure that everything that leaves our kitchen is something we ourselves would feel good about putting into our bodies + tastes the way we would want a clean product to taste, amazing!

Watching our company grow has been such a privilege, and we've been working really, really hard to keep up with the ever-increasing number of orders coming in from all over not only California, but also the US! 

Our products are currently available at a farmers market that we’ve been attending every Saturday for the past couple years as well as several local coffee shops, cafes, and studios in and around our home base of Costa Mesa/ Newport Beach.

 

Who We Are

The Source is currently a small operation run by a team of 4 at the best of times (if you didn’t know, now you know!). As a team, we really pride ourselves in using the best quality ingredients we can get our hands on.

We strongly believe in developing our business under ecologically responsible standards and we will always remain committed to honest ingredients. We believe that having a clean, handmade product should come hand-in-hand with incredible customer service and a responsible business model.

 

The Space

We took a huge step with The Source in 2017 and leased our own space in Costa Mesa to produce out of! We desperately needed the space to store supplies, bulk ingredients, etc and we were growing and knew we’d eventually need space for a bigger team.

The space leased was a warehouse space, not a kitchen, and we used all the resources we had made over the past couple years of business to build out our own kitchen space. We acquired all the city permits, health permits, and state permits we needed (whew! SO much work!), and got the final OK to start working out of there by the end of November 2017.

 

 

Why We Need Funding

We’re launching this campaign to make our products available to a bigger market. To begin with, we need an electrical upgrade, and more fridge and freezer space so funds will first be used to acquire these things, followed by some bigger production equipment (we know, seems minor, but these things are sooo expensive!). Funds will also be used for start up packaging supplies, general production, e-commerce building and possible distribution set up costs.

If we surpass our goal, we will use the extra funding towards converting our recipes into a full-blown commercial formulation. We will also use it towards looking for and leasing a smaller, retail location where we can have customers come in and buy products directly from us instead of only being able to order online.

With your help, we hope to be able to transform our small operation into a bona fide commercial production and make our products available to health-conscious food lovers across the US.

Quick Summary:

  • Need freezers, refrigerators, and equipment to help with the current 100% manual operation
  • Electrical upgrade for our unit
  • Display fridge
  • Ingredients in bulk
  • Packaging design work
  • Purchasing packaging material
  • E-commerce build out
  • Subsidizing shipping costs (shipping materials in bulk as well as shipping services)
  • Refrigerated van for deliveries
  • Partnering with commercial facilities to start bigger production on our bliss balls
  • Obtaining the proper FDA food labeling/ food certifications

The more money we raise, the more time and leeway we will have for:

  • Developing new flavors, designs, etc.
  • Expanding our own in-house production
  • Social initiatives and more sustainable operations

 

Risks & Challenges

We've come quite a ways in designing our products to reflect our company's core values: SIMPLE INGREDIENTS, WHOLE FOODS, and REAL INGREDIENTS. With that in mind, we face some conceivable (but solvable) challenges, such as:

  1. Creating a viable manufacturing structure to allow meeting the market demand and growth while using a commercial manufacturing formulation with adherence to only natural ingredients. This is important to us and we are confident that we can make it happen.
  2. Obtaining the proper FDA Food labeling/Food Certifications: There is an overabundance of food certifications (Organic, Non-GMO Project Verified, Gluten Free, Vegan etc) that we are looking into and we are quickly learning about the entire process of being certified.
  3. Our plan is to source recyclable packaging, within the price point that is necessary in order to keep our products at a reasonable price. To this end, we may have to release our products to market with the goal of finding recyclable packaging within 5 years or sooner as we are committed to our eco-footprint on the Earth.

 

Thank you for your support in giving us the opportunity to bring what we believe is a healthier and more honest option to the market!

 

Special thanks to:

Our families (Sholeh, Debi, Bill), Robert Berger (our amazing family friend and business advisor), Ivan Hulka (long time family friend and engineer extraordinaire), our incredible and loyal customers, and all our friends who have stood by us through cancelled plans after cancelled plans.
