story:
ABOUT OUR DREAM

We started homebrewing together over 5 years ago, igniting our passion for craft beer.  Since then, we've watched the craft beer industry expand and flourish year after year.  From visiting breweries, meeting with brewers and chatting with customers, it's clear to us that craft beer isn't just a business, it's a community.  We want to embrace that community with an establishment that focuses on the importance of local craft breweries.  Our philosophy is that there is a beer for everyone.  And with so many styles to choose from, we're confidant that we can convert even the most stubborn non-beer drinker.  With 16 rotating taps and 300 different bottles, we'll be able to serve an amazing selection of beers from the Southern California area.

ABOUT OUR NEIGHBORHOOD

We'll be opening in the NoHo Arts District of North Hollywood, California.  The NoHo Arts District is an ever-growing community of young professionals with a reputation for supporting small businesses. Hop Merchants will be the first store of its kind in the San Fernando Valley. We're essentially a hybrid beer bar/store with 16 rotating taps and 300 individual bottles that you'll be able to purchase and drink at the shop or take home with you.  We don't serve food but you can bring your own, or even have it delivered.  Heck, we'll even supply the menus and recommendations. We want to support local businesses and hope that, in turn, they will support us.

ABOUT THE OWNERS

The team is led by Christian Thomas, Kevin Sack, and Adrian Baez...three guys who started homebrewing their own beer in Christian's garage while dreaming about someday opening their own place to call beervana. Through the years, we've accumulated a vast scope of knowledge on all things beer from the history and evolution of various styles to proper serving techniques, storing conditions, and culinary influences. In other words, we are the beer nerds your parents warned you about. Be afraid. Be very very somewhat afraid. 

HOW WE CAN HELP YOU HELP US

We're raising $35,000 to build the bar and draft system that you deserve.  Ever been served a beer that just doesn't taste right?  It can be traumatizing.  Beer is best served fresh, and the only way to ensure its freshness is with a state of the art draft system. You'll be helping us purchase two brand spanking new keg refrigerators, each with a shiny 8-faucet draft tower.   I know, we're excited too.  Of course, you'll need a place to set your delicious beer. Your contribution will also go toward the design and construction of a beautiful custom-built bar. Our business is beer and these two items are essential.

Now, we love that you want to give us your hard earned money, but we wouldn't think of accepting it without giving you something in return.  We tried for a sainthood for each of you, but the Vatican just wouldn't budge.  Instead, we've put together a nice list of perks, from free tasting flights to free beer for life.  You read that right...for life! Check 'em out and find the one that's right for you.  Of course, all of our supporters will be invited to our soft opening this summer!

Even if we don't achieve our funding goal, whatever we raise will be put toward the bar and draft system.  Thanks again for your support!
story_txt: ABOUT OUR DREAMWe started homebrewing together over 5 years ago, igniting our passion for craft beer.  Since then, we've watched the craft beer industry expand and flourish year after year.  From visiting breweries, meeting with brewers and chatting with customers, it's clear to us that craft beer isn't just a business, it's a community.  We want to embrace that community with an establishment that focuses on the importance of local craft breweries.  Our philosophy is that there is a beer for everyone.  And with so many styles to choose from, we're confidant that we can convert even the most stubborn non-beer drinker.  With 16 rotating taps and 300 different bottles, we'll be able to serve an amazing selection of beers from the Southern California area.ABOUT OUR NEIGHBORHOODWe'll be opening in the NoHo Arts District of North Hollywood, California.  The NoHo Arts District is an ever-growing community of young professionals with a reputation for supporting small businesses. Hop Merchants will be the first store of its kind in the San Fernando Valley. We're essentially a hybrid beer bar/store with 16 rotating taps and 300 individual bottles that you'll be able to purchase and drink at the shop or take home with you.  We don't serve food but you can bring your own, or even have it delivered.  Heck, we'll even supply the menus and recommendations. We want to support local businesses and hope that, in turn, they will support us.ABOUT THE OWNERSThe team is led by Christian Thomas, Kevin Sack, and Adrian Baez...three guys who started homebrewing their own beer in Christian's garage while dreaming about someday opening their own place to call beervana. Through the years, we've accumulated a vast scope of knowledge on all things beer from the history and evolution of various styles to proper serving techniques, storing conditions, and culinary influences. In other words, we are the beer nerds your parents warned you about. Be afraid. Be very very somewhat afraid. HOW WE CAN HELP YOU HELP USWe're raising $35,000 to build the bar and draft system that you deserve.  Ever been served a beer that just doesn't taste right?  It can be traumatizing.  Beer is best served fresh, and the only way to ensure its freshness is with a state of the art draft system. You'll be helping us purchase two brand spanking new keg refrigerators, each with a shiny 8-faucet draft tower.   I know, we're excited too.  Of course, you'll need a place to set your delicious beer. Your contribution will also go toward the design and construction of a beautiful custom-built bar. Our business is beer and these two items are essential.Now, we love that you want to give us your hard earned money, but we wouldn't think of accepting it without giving you something in return.  We tried for a sainthood for each of you, but the Vatican just wouldn't budge.  Instead, we've put together a nice list of perks, from free tasting flights to free beer for life.  You read that right...for life! Check 'em out and find the one that's right for you.  Of course, all of our supporters will be invited to our soft opening this summer!Even if we don't achieve our funding goal, whatever we raise will be put toward the bar and draft system.  Thanks again for your support!

story:
Short Summary

  • We have spent the last 5 years traveling the country to not only find the best location for Rusty Spur, but to also check out the best Western Dance-Halls and what makes them so great.
  • Full size dance floor, full bar, billiards, special events, and authentic decor that will transport you to the old west!
  • With its history from Jesse James to historic Route 66, we believe Rolla, MO is the perfect place.
  • Every dollar raised will get us one step closer. We are determined, we are motivated. With your help, we will make our dreams a reality and give Rolla something it truly deserves.

What We Need & What You Get

  • We need $250,000 to make this happen. Obviously anything over that will speed up the process, but we need this to purchase the right property. We want to do this right the first time.
  • We have several perks to choose from. However, Gold and Silver Memberships are limited to 500 each.
  • If for some reason we do not meet our funding goal we will seek financing from banks and investors to make up the difference. The closer we get the better. You can rest assured that we are determined to make this dream a reality. 

Fun For Everyone

We want to make Rusty Spur fun for all ages:

  • Live music from local and well known artists.
  • Mondays and Tuesdays will be alcohol free for teenagers. 
  • Rusty Spur will offer Free dance lessons every Wednesday. 
  • Thursdays, Fridays, and Saturdays we turn the music...and fun... all the way up!

Risks & Challenges

We realize there are many obstacles in our way.

  • Funding is number one, but with your help we can overcome this.
  • We have started many successful businesses and we know what customers demand.
  • Rusty Spur will be much more than a Dance-Hall & Saloon, it will be a destination!

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean you can't help:

  • Ask folks to get the word out and make some noise about Rusty Spur.
  • Use the Indiegogo share tools, and of course share with everyone on Facebook!

Full size dance floor, full bar, billiards, special events, and authentic decor that will transport you to the old west!
With its history from Jesse James to historic Route 66, we believe Rolla, MO is the perfect place.
Every dollar raised will get us one step closer. We are determined, we are motivated. With your help, we will make our dreams a reality and give Rolla something it truly deserves.

We have several perks to choose from. However, Gold and Silver Memberships are limited to 500 each.
If for some reason we do not meet our funding goal we will seek financing from banks and investors to make up the difference. The closer we get the better. You can rest assured that we are determined to make this dream a reality. 


Fun For Everyone
We want to make Rusty Spur fun for all ages:

Live music from local and well known artists.
Mondays and Tuesdays will be alcohol free for teenagers. 
Rusty Spur will offer Free dance lessons every Wednesday. 
Thursdays, Fridays, and Saturdays we turn the music...and fun... all the way up!


Risks & Challenges
We realize there are many obstacles in our way.

Funding is number one, but with your help we can overcome this.
We have started many successful businesses and we know what customers demand.
Rusty Spur will be much more than a Dance-Hall & Saloon, it will be a destination!


Other Ways You Can Help
Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean you can't help:

Ask folks to get the word out and make some noise about Rusty Spur.
Use the Indiegogo share tools, and of course share with everyone on Facebook!

story:
My name is Kat Valentina and I find joy and purpose in working with the plant and spirits world.  With over two decades of hospitality and immersion in the bar industry, I have grown from cocktail server to medicinal mixologist.  I grew up with a chef mom and a garden for which I was responsible as a participant... planting the seed of a farm to EVERYTHING way of living.  Having studied Traditional Chinese Medicine and Planetary Herbology, my passion for bringing herbal blends has been ignited.  Creating cocktails in the styling of medicinal mixology is where I flourish.  Bringing beautiful craft spirits together with seasonal produce and  healing bitters and tinctures is where HOME is to me.  It sits right with my soul and also usually looks pretty good in a cocktail glass! The bitters and tinctures at Elemental Spirits are blends that, YES taste excellent in a cocktail, and also can be used for healing benefit by themselves.  I do not add sugar or water to my blends, allowing maximum healing potential.   Creating cocktails and herbal blends that offer healing and conscious imbibing is my focus and passion.  I have the opportunity to expand the reach of my brand, and hope you are as excited as I am to find Elemental Spirits in the marketplace! 

With your contribution and support, I can achieve the basics of expansion... buy more supplies for production, packaging, and distribution.  Also, as a solo business owner, I am ready for help in the areas that are not my expertise... marketing and social media.  Being able to hire consultants to further my vision helps me further the healing!  I am aiming for $25,000 to begin the process, that with future sales, I am confident I can continue the growth of Elemental Spirits.

I am offering unique perks which include a personal consultation along with a custom blend tincture/bitters, bitters maceration & medicinal mixology classes, or a cocktail event featuring Elemental Spirits.

Any money donated will go directly into the production and distribution of Elemental Spirits!  ALL donations GRATEFULLY accepted... If you can't donate, but like what you see, please share my campaign with others! Again, as a solo lady on a mission, I am appreciative of all assistance.. Stay blessed and joyful, and may your day be mixed to perfection...

story:
"The Spartans UFO Bar"

This is where Earth meets Space,

Where Creativity meets Design,
Where Imagination meets Reality!

 

 

The first UFO mobile bar in the world, and you my lovely, get to be one of the founders of it!

Isn't that marvelous?
We're combining the two worlds together to bring you an outer space experience with our molecular cocktail and of course the UFO Bar!

With your help we can create the world first UFO mobile bar and we'll land it in your back yard, or even better, by backing us with just £25, you'll get a ticket to the Launch Party and reap the fruition of this amazing project/campaign.

This is a great opportunity to back a unique project that hasn't been done before and reap the result of it once it's completed, by having an amazing experience in joining us for the Launch Party. We mostly need your backing to bring this project to existence. You can get involved in this beautiful project by clicking the Red button to back us and or share it with your friends, family or whoever you think that might be interested in this project.

 

Molecular Cocktails:

We'll be serving,out of this world and unique, molecular cocktails from our UFO Bar. Molecular mixology is the process of creating cocktails using the equipment and techniques of molecular gastronomy. Its a process of turning your drink into a gel, powder, foam or atomized spray..

 

 

 

 

Meet the Team:

Hi, I am Cristina Voda and I am Spartacus Jahish, we are the Founders of Spartans CocktailTaxi Ltd.

 

 

Spartans Cocktailtaxi Ltd. started in 2014 as a new comer in the Spirit industry with a new concept of delivering cocktails to the consumer's comfort of own home, office, public parks etc.
Having a passion for creativity and design and a love for classic cars, specially the classic VW Camper vans and a greater passion for mixing cocktails, four years ago my significant other and I came up with an idea of setting up a cocktail delivery service. After long hours of thinking and drawing and fishing online for ideas, we've designed our VW mobile bar.

 

 


4 years along the line and successfully making Spartans CocktailTaxi Ltd. into a brand of innovation and creativity in the industry, and winning the Best and the most Creative cocktail awards at London cocktail week, we knew we were on the right direction.
We are now nominated for other awards in 2018 for our delivery service, innovative idea and services.
Spirit industry is becoming a fast paced industry with everyday new cocktails and cocktail bars appearing with amazing concepts. We thrive on being an innovative and creative company in the field of cocktails and bar design. Spartans CocktailTaxi is a pacesetter in the industry and is known to be the first to properly define the concept of 24h cocktail delivery service business in terms of products.
After successfully spreading the love for cocktail delivery across London, we are ready for the next step and determined to revolutionize the mobile catering and PopUp industry.

 

PERKS:

By backing us with just £25 you'll receive a ticket to the Launch Party, where you get to party with us Spartans style, and on top of that you'll get to enjoy all your drinks at 10% discount. Or, if you back us with £500 you and a friend will get to party with us and drinks are on us.

 

 

We have teamed up with the amazing artist Papi the creator of "Be Illuminated" to design a Limited Edition, and not only that, more greatly this is the first ever t-shirts designed by "Be Illuminated". Papi combines contemporary with modern and Tattoos with Lights to create a breath taking collectable art pieces. His work has been showcased at the "Lights of Soho" and many other prestigious art galleries around Britain and the World. You can find Papi's work at the homes of TV personalities like Alan Carr or musicians like the members of the Legendary Rolling Stones, to name a couple.

 

 

Budget:

We will be working with the Britain's best GRP design company to build the UFO Bar and we're building it from scratch.
D&D has build structures for many major companies and institutions like MoD and the TFL to name a couple. We will be working along side D&D from executing the perfect pre-design to finishing the project. We will be keeping you up to date with the progress as we go along.
We need to the budget to build the UFO and we have to carry the UFO from the storage to the venue and back and for that we need to build a specialized trailer to fit the UFO in so it safe while transporting it.


 

 

 

Impact:

We are creating something that has never been done before.
We wanted to combine creativity, innovation, molecular cocktail and mobility together, and create something out of this world. A UFO that turns into a Bar serving molecular cocktails. Once it's all done and the bar is ready, we can land the UFO at your premises for the party you're hosting. Can you imagine the look at your guests face when they see a UFO in your back yard? A total "WOW" factor!
We believe our UFO Bar would make a great impact on the atmosphere you want to create at YOUR Party and imagine you're guests being served from a state of the art UFO Bar!

 

 

Risk & challenges:

As mentioned before, we are working with Britain's best GRP design company who will deliver the project beyond expectations.

Being an established company in the industry and having secured festivals for the upcoming years there is only one way, and that is SUCCESS!

 

 

Other ways you can help:

We need your backing to bring this beautifully amazing UFO Bar to life. You can help with as little or as much as you can. We appreciate every bit of contribution whether it is by backing us financially or getting the word out to world.

We humbly thanking you all for your help in making this project happen and please please please back us or share this with the world.

Media Coverage:

story:
Who is Kettle Kid?

Kettle Kid is 13 year-old Trenton, Hannah from Branford, Connecticut. He plays trombone with his middle school band, is a member of Walter Pop Smith baseball league and loves popcorn. In order to put away for college and attend exciting summer camps, Trent decided to combine his love for spice and popcorn and started his own business during the summer of 2017, with the help of his mom.

Trent has gotten rave reviews for his popcorn and he's excited to continue this entrepreneurial journey with your help! 

Where your money will go

In order to make this business even more of a success, we're going to need money for production equipment and supplies (Please look over to the right where you'll see the perks that come with different donation amounts!) *We will also be donating a portion of the proceeds to Walter Pop Smith Baseball League and band uniforms for Troup School in New Haven, CT.*

  • Cart for festivals
  • Additional popcorn machines (we only have one and realized we need more after serving 500 at an event)
  • Large popcorn mixer
  • Licensing fees
  • Marketing & distribution
  • Themed party supplies (Kettle Kid plates, napkins, cups and balloons for your party!)
  • Kettle Kid Scholarship Program for kidpreneurs like myself

The Impact

This campaign will truly allow me to :

  • Follow my dreams and expand my business as an entrepreneur
  • Help other kidpreneurs who would like to start their own business with the scholarship fund
  • Put away for college and summer camp

Other Ways You Can Help

Don't have the funds to contribute right now? That's OK! You can still help us spread the word by sharing our links on all social media platforms! It takes a village and all support is truly appreciated! So get to sharing already!

story:
Entrepreneur Elevator Pitch

w/ Danica Patrick (See 14:35)

TruEnergy - The Healthy Energy Drink

Ever tempted fate by guzzling down too many energy drinks leading to heart palpitations?
Here's a thought. Your every day branded energy drinks are just sugar laden sodas with caffeine. Tired of the "monster" in the room, our team formulated a good-for-you alternative infused with natural ingredients that tasted great while also delivering on the promise of a long lasting smooth boost of clean energy. 

 

TruFocus - The Office Hero Beverage

Ever want to knock your boss straight in the jibs for publicly humiliating due to your lack of focus? With this cutting-edge beverage, gone will be the days of having to reach for those illegal "limitless pills" stored secretly deep in your desk. Developed with highly functional herbal ingredients and paired with a 2:1 nootropic stack, TruFocus will help increase mental acuity and improve overall focus so that you can take that jerks job.

 

TruPower - The Powderless Pre Workout 

Ever forced down a chalky pre workout mix with a cheese curd texture that tasted like old fermented milk? We have and we refuse to do it again. Designed by athletes for athletes, this sport shot delivers a serious boost of power. Amped up with 2x natural caffeine and fortified with BCAA and Beta Alanine, we guarantee that TruPower Pre Workout will quickly become your favorite spotter at the gym.

 

TruRally - The Antihangover Lemon Aid

Ever tempted fate by guzzling down too many energy drinks leading to heart palpitations?
Here's a thought. Your every day branded energy drinks are just sugar laden sodas with caffeine. Tired of the "monster" in the room, our team formulated a good-for-you alternative infused with natural ingredients that tasted great while also delivering on the promise of a long lasting smooth boost of clean energy. 

 

TruSleep - The Sleep Support Shot

Ever reached into the cupboard for some of grandpa's good ole' cough syrup for a good night sleep? Here's the deal. The market and its fancy commercials riddled with side effects and smiling faces wants you to believe that the only solution to zzz's is over the counter drugs; however, it is a dangerous and false lesson. Maybe counting sheep is a loss cause, but natural alternatives like Melatonin when paired appropriately can result in some very sweet dreams. 

 

Why Trust the Man in the Speedo

While playing pro hockey in Europe, Jack "the speedo flaunting founder" McNamara took his first steps into entrepreneurship participating in one of Denmark’s top student incubators, Copenhagen School of Entrepreneurship. After hanging up the skates, he moved to NYC with one of his business partners, Robert Avakian, where they participated in the accelerators; Startup 52 and Food-X. 

Despite surfing couches, crashing offices and even living in a gym, the team has successfully funded a Kickstarter, added strategic brick and mortars including Market Basket and HyVee, online stores like Amazon and Jet, while also partnering with the largest vending company in New England, A&B Vending. With over 500 facings across the USA, our team has proven the ability to bring a product to market. In addition, we have been featured in the likes of Forbes, Fortune, and Entrepreneur while also adding endorsements from major athletes in leagues from the NHL to the MLL.

 

Team Tru Testimonials

Here's a list of some of the professional athletes on board the Tru Tru Train and none of them are paid endorsements as they believe in the product and the mission. We have even more at drinktru.com which includes athletes from the NFL and Racing. 

Mike Condon, Ottawa Senators (NHL)

“When I am in need of a nice quick pick me up, TruEnergy gives me everything I need.”

Jesse Winchester (Colorado Avalanche, NHL Retired) 

“I am a huge fan of TruEnergy; the shot gives me an extra burst of energy when I need it, and I am able to enjoy it without THE crash that I’ve experienced with other similar products! Thank you TruEnergy for making my day. ”​

McKenzie Meehan (Sky Blue FC, NWSL)

“As a professional soccer player, I really enjoy taking TruEnergy. It’s a great product both in season and off-season, as it can provide a great boost of energy prior to an early morning workout or it can be a great energizer between two tough sessions. I would recommend any athlete, whether recreational or elite, to give this product a try.”

James Fahey (Atlanta Blaze, MLL)​

​“As a pro lacrosse player we don’t have team workouts or team practices in the off season. It’s our responsibility to create a efficient dietary plan, fitness and skill training regiment as well as balancing a full time job. After being on my feet all day at work, I shoot back a TruEnergy and it enables me to put in the solid hours in the gym I need to prepare for the upcoming season.”

Emily Harman (Ex-Pro Tennis Player / Division 1 Coach)

​“As a former professional tennis player and now a division 1 coach, I have learned the hard way what it means to balance energy levels with peak cognitive performance. TruEnergy has been an innovative and natural solution to stay focused mentally while maintaining physical energy throughout all aspects of professional training and student-athlete life.

Aaron Fossas (Cincinatti Reds, MLB Prospect)

“Absolutely loving ‘TruEnergy’ for providing me the energy and fuel needed to prepare for Spring Training. For anyone who passionately pursues their dreams check out @_jackmcnamara for some inspiration and to see what he has to help you take what you do to the next level ”​

Lenny Futterman (Rower, USA Senior National Team)

“As an elite athlete, I am constantly searching for the best products to power my workouts. After years of using different pre-workout mixes that would either give me a huge jolt and crash, or just leave me feeling sick by the end of a workout, I finally came upon TruEnergy. It is loaded with all natural ingredients that make your body preform better. I find that it dials me in to the task at hand without the painful side effects of other products.”

Richie Dart (Triathlete)

“I used to force a coffee down in the morning and then get on the bike to ride for a few hours, now I drink Tru in the morning and I don’t deal with the stomach issues from coffee when I am in the aero position on the bike and I am getting even better results! Tru is a staple in my training for Ironman and will be with me on the course, especially during the second half of the marathon!”

Ben Eaves (Director of Human Performance, Miami RedHawks)

“I use and highly recommend TruEnergy to all the athletes I train. Whether it is before a practice, workout or a midday boost, TruEnergy delivers a great tasting drink that enhances performance.”

Jessica Wacnik (Pro Tennis Player)

“TruEnergy is awesome... it tastes good and I actually felt a difference after taking it. I don’t normally take anything caffeinated because I’m afraid of getting jittery but it was perfect.”

RJ Umberger (Philadelphia Flyers, NHL)

​“ I used ‘TruEnergy’ for a couple work outs in the morning when I was dragging and it definitely gave me a kick start. I wish I was still playing to give them a try for games.”

 

All Aboard the Tru Tru Train

Following over 3 years of progress and continuing to disrupt a major industry on a bootstrapped budget, our team has drawn zero salary for our work. Although it would be nice to afford salaries at some point, we aren't driven by cash, we are driven by a passion for nutrition, exercise, design, and entrepreneurship. We push the envelop because we love what we do and we are confident that we will change the game in the wild west world of supplements with your help. Thank you for all that you do to support our crazy dreams as we consider all of our backers a part of our team. We will not let you down, as without you, we are nothing.

Total Transparency

As we have gone through the formulation and manufacturing process before, we are confident that we will deliver a great product that everyone will love; however, we also know that there may be some minor changes. Every time we manufacture a run, we try to make an improvement as we don't believe in perfection. We believe in progress through constant innovation. In other words, we may have to make some minor iterations on the amount of each ingredient or the potential substitution for specific ingredients like sweeteners. We do this in order to develop an amazing product that you will taste great and still surpass your functional expectations so that you will share it with the world. Our promise to you is that when you receive our product, you will love to Drink Tru!

 

Lets Go Viral

Forking over your hard earned cash for a product that is yet to be manufactured is definitely a huge ask, so we totally get it if you want to wait... That being said, any help spreading our campaign and our crazy video would be a huge help. At the end of the day, we are in the business of competing against Monsters and fighting Bulls (literally) with insane marketing budgets, so we need your help to get our brand to the masses. Your help is extremely appreciated!
story_txt:
Entrepreneur Elevator Pitch
w/ Danica Patrick (See 14:35)



TruEnergy - The Healthy Energy Drink
Ever tempted fate by guzzling down too many energy drinks leading to heart palpitations?Here's a thought. Your every day branded energy drinks are just sugar laden sodas with caffeine. Tired of the "monster" in the room, our team formulated a good-for-you alternative infused with natural ingredients that tasted great while also delivering on the promise of a long lasting smooth boost of clean energy. 
 

TruFocus - The Office Hero Beverage
Ever want to knock your boss straight in the jibs for publicly humiliating due to your lack of focus? With this cutting-edge beverage, gone will be the days of having to reach for those illegal "limitless pills" stored secretly deep in your desk. Developed with highly functional herbal ingredients and paired with a 2:1 nootropic stack, TruFocus will help increase mental acuity and improve overall focus so that you can take that jerks job.
 

TruPower - The Powderless Pre Workout 
Ever forced down a chalky pre workout mix with a cheese curd texture that tasted like old fermented milk? We have and we refuse to do it again. Designed by athletes for athletes, this sport shot delivers a serious boost of power. Amped up with 2x natural caffeine and fortified with BCAA and Beta Alanine, we guarantee that TruPower Pre Workout will quickly become your favorite spotter at the gym.
 

TruRally - The Antihangover Lemon Aid
Ever tempted fate by guzzling down too many energy drinks leading to heart palpitations?Here's a thought. Your every day branded energy drinks are just sugar laden sodas with caffeine. Tired of the "monster" in the room, our team formulated a good-for-you alternative infused with natural ingredients that tasted great while also delivering on the promise of a long lasting smooth boost of clean energy. 
 

TruSleep - The Sleep Support Shot
Ever reached into the cupboard for some of grandpa's good ole' cough syrup for a good night sleep? Here's the deal. The market and its fancy commercials riddled with side effects and smiling faces wants you to believe that the only solution to zzz's is over the counter drugs; however, it is a dangerous and false lesson. Maybe counting sheep is a loss cause, but natural alternatives like Melatonin when paired appropriately can result in some very sweet dreams. 
 

Why Trust the Man in the Speedo
While playing pro hockey in Europe, Jack "the speedo flaunting founder" McNamara took his first steps into entrepreneurship participating in one of Denmark’s top student incubators, Copenhagen School of Entrepreneurship. After hanging up the skates, he moved to NYC with one of his business partners, Robert Avakian, where they participated in the accelerators; Startup 52 and Food-X. 
Despite surfing couches, crashing offices and even living in a gym, the team has successfully funded a Kickstarter, added strategic brick and mortars including Market Basket and HyVee, online stores like Amazon and Jet, while also partnering with the largest vending company in New England, A&B Vending. With over 500 facings across the USA, our team has proven the ability to bring a product to market. In addition, we have been featured in the likes of Forbes, Fortune, and Entrepreneur while also adding endorsements from major athletes in leagues from the NHL to the MLL.
 

Team Tru Testimonials
Here's a list of some of the professional athletes on board the Tru Tru Train and none of them are paid endorsements as they believe in the product and the mission. We have even more at drinktru.com which includes athletes from the NFL and Racing. 
Mike Condon, Ottawa Senators (NHL)
“When I am in need of a nice quick pick me up, TruEnergy gives me everything I need.”
Jesse Winchester (Colorado Avalanche, NHL Retired) 
“I am a huge fan of TruEnergy; the shot gives me an extra burst of energy when I need it, and I am able to enjoy it without THE crash that I’ve experienced with other similar products! Thank you TruEnergy for making my day. ”​
McKenzie Meehan (Sky Blue FC, NWSL)
“As a professional soccer player, I really enjoy taking TruEnergy. It’s a great product both in season and off-season, as it can provide a great boost of energy prior to an early morning workout or it can be a great energizer between two tough sessions. I would recommend any athlete, whether recreational or elite, to give this product a try.”
James Fahey (Atlanta Blaze, MLL)​
​“As a pro lacrosse player we don’t have team workouts or team practices in the off season. It’s our responsibility to create a efficient dietary plan, fitness and skill training regiment as well as balancing a full time job. After being on my feet all day at work, I shoot back a TruEnergy and it enables me to put in the solid hours in the gym I need to prepare for the upcoming season.”
Emily Harman (Ex-Pro Tennis Player / Division 1 Coach)
​“As a former professional tennis player and now a division 1 coach, I have learned the hard way what it means to balance energy levels with peak cognitive performance. TruEnergy has been an innovative and natural solution to stay focused mentally while maintaining physical energy throughout all aspects of professional training and student-athlete life.
Aaron Fossas (Cincinatti Reds, MLB Prospect)
“Absolutely loving ‘TruEnergy’ for providing me the energy and fuel needed to prepare for Spring Training. For anyone who passionately pursues their dreams check out @_jackmcnamara for some inspiration and to see what he has to help you take what you do to the next level ”​
Lenny Futterman (Rower, USA Senior National Team)
“As an elite athlete, I am constantly searching for the best products to power my workouts. After years of using different pre-workout mixes that would either give me a huge jolt and crash, or just leave me feeling sick by the end of a workout, I finally came upon TruEnergy. It is loaded with all natural ingredients that make your body preform better. I find that it dials me in to the task at hand without the painful side effects of other products.”
Richie Dart (Triathlete)
“I used to force a coffee down in the morning and then get on the bike to ride for a few hours, now I drink Tru in the morning and I don’t deal with the stomach issues from coffee when I am in the aero position on the bike and I am getting even better results! Tru is a staple in my training for Ironman and will be with me on the course, especially during the second half of the marathon!”
Ben Eaves (Director of Human Performance, Miami RedHawks)
“I use and highly recommend TruEnergy to all the athletes I train. Whether it is before a practice, workout or a midday boost, TruEnergy delivers a great tasting drink that enhances performance.”
Jessica Wacnik (Pro Tennis Player)
“TruEnergy is awesome... it tastes good and I actually felt a difference after taking it. I don’t normally take anything caffeinated because I’m afraid of getting jittery but it was perfect.”
RJ Umberger (Philadelphia Flyers, NHL)
​“ I used ‘TruEnergy’ for a couple work outs in the morning when I was dragging and it definitely gave me a kick start. I wish I was still playing to give them a try for games.”

story:
Bard's Beer, the Original Gluten-Free sorghum malt beer needs your help to meet growing demand!

 

This Indiegogo campaign is a little bit different.  It's not a start-up.  Bard's Beer already has a product developed, (in fact, it's been on the market for 14 years!) and we already have a base of loyal, passionate fans in the United States and Canada.  

What we DON'T have is wide-scale distribution for our product, nor the brewing capacity to deliver all of the beer that is in demand.  That's where you come in. 

People LOVE Bard's Beer because…

  • Bard's Beer is Truly Gluten-Free™ (no wheat, barley, rye or oats).
  • Bard's Beer is not “gluten reduced” like many of the alternatives on the market.
  • Bard's Beer tastes great!
  • Bard's Beer is refreshing to drink, with no bitter after-taste.
  • Bard's Beer is LABORATORY TESTED to be Gluten-free.
  • Bard's Beer was invented by Craig Belser, a diagnosed Celiac who understands the complex needs of this condition.
  • You don't have to be Celiac to benefit from Truly Gluten-Free™ beer!  Many folks looking to reduce inflammation-causing substances in their body, yet still enjoy a great tasting beer are big fans of Bard's Beer.  

But the #1 complaint about Bard's is this “I can't ever find it when I want it!”  

Bard's Beer customer Jim Brodie pretty much sums it up: “Just get me beer. I haven't been able to find you in years! I will pay whatever ransom is required to free the beer! Yes, seriously. “

 

 

 

 

 

That's right.  The only problem worse than a great product with no customers, is a great product with passionate customers, but you can't make enough product to satisfy demand!  We are currently brewing as much Bard's Beer as we can, but it's still not enough.  So, we need to add a second brewery line, and we need to expand distribution.  And we need to do it FAST.  

 

In order to make this happen, and satisfy the tens of thousands of Bard's Beer fans across the US and Canada, this Indiegogo campaign has been launched.

Fund this Indiegogo to help us make MORE Bard's Beer, and you'll not only get great perks and swag, but you'll ensure Bard's Beer is available to gluten-free beer lovers everywhere!

Why we need funding

Bard's partners with brewers using our exacting recipe and specifications to brew the amazing product that gluten-free beer lovers all over North America know and love as Bard’s Beer. Due to the COVID-19 pandemic, brewing capacity at brewers is uneven at best, and totally shut down in some cases.  Add to that the aluminum can shortage that has been making headlines across America, and it's a situation that has made it VERY difficult for us to keep up with demand for Bard's.  

BUT, we are in the process of opening up not one, but TWO new brewers so we can get Bard's to everyone who wants it.  

The cost of opening these brewers is substantial, the brewmeisters have to be trained in the special and unique aspects of brewing sorghum based beer instead of wheat or barley.  Tens of thousands of aluminum cans need to be sourced, shipped and printed.  New cases for the beer need to be printed, and because we use our own proprietary sorghum sourced from a very specific area of the midwest we have to ship literally tons of sorghum into the new brewery. 

All of these costs add up quickly. And like so many businesses during this tough time, cash is short for us as well.  

That's where you come in, with an opportunity to become a “Bard's Backer” and help us get these new brewers set up. 

Why crowdfunding?

We are using Indiegogo for this project because by doing a crowdfunding campaign, we are hoping to increase coast-to-coast awareness of Bard's Beer, and engage our loyal customers to spread the word!

Additionally, the various events we have planned for this campaign, such as the Backyard BBQ, pizza party, Tasting Board, etc. are all designed to help bring FUN into the fund-raising process. It's a chance for us to get together to celebrate great beer, good friends and the magic that comes from supporting one another, especially in these tough times. Can't get that from a bank loan!

How you can help

As special Thank You for your support, we have exclusive perks in every range, up to and including a trip to our new contract brewers in St. Louis, Missouri OR Toronto, Canada to watch Bard's coming off the line, tasting and testing the batch before it's shipped...and even an opportunity to join us as a member of the Bard's Tasting Advisory Board, where you can help us develop, name and taste the NEWEST style of Bard's Beer!

We need to raise at least $65,000 to cover all of the costs of getting both brewers set up and start to see Bard's flowing to the thirsty marketplace.

If we don't hit that goal, we can still get set up with at least one of the two brewers, and continue to try our best to keep up with demands from stores and distributors.  We really hope that doesn't happen though, because once a retailer places an order, and we can't ship...well, they are pretty unforgiving about that, and there may never be another order from them again. 

 

Bard's Backer Perks

IMPORTANT NOTE ABOUT PERKS: All of the custom logo perks featured for this campaign were sourced from a company in Roseburg, Oregon, a small town in Southwestern Oregon. Roseburg has been mostly safe from the fires that have devastated the Pacific Northwest as of late, however MANY evacuees have been forced to seek shelter in small towns such as Roseburg. We wanted to let you know that your support of this Bard's Beer campaign will ALSO help support wildfire relief efforts, as the company has been heavily involved in supporting and taking care of evacuees during this difficult time. Thank you for your support!

 

Digital Thank You ($5)

  • Your name on a Digital “Bard's Backer” thank you page on the Bard’s website.

 

Bard's Beer Stickers ($10)

  • A set of two (2) Bard's Beer logo stickers, suitable for sticking on your water bottle, laptop, vehicle or cooler!  
  • Plus - Your name on a Digital “Thank you” page on the Bard’s website 

 

Bard's Beer Can Coozie ($20)

This beautiful, collapsible can Coozie will keep your Bard's Beer cold...and do it in STYLE with a unique sublimated “Bubbles of Bard's Beer” background, along with the official Bard's Beer logo front and center. 

  • Plus one (1) Bard's Beer sticker, suitable for sticking on your water bottle, laptop, vehicle or cooler!  
  • Plus - Your name on a Digital “Thank you” page on the Bard’s website 

 

Bard's Beer Logo Gaiter Face Mask ($30)

Show your “Gluten Freedom” with this stylish, rules-compliant neck gaiter, which can be used as a face mask, plus more than a dozen other uses!   (Headband, balaclava, neckerchief, scarf, bandanna, you can even use it as an arm sling in an emergency!)

  • Plus one (1) Bard's Beer sticker, suitable for sticking on your water bottle, laptop, vehicle or cooler!  
  • Plus - Your name on a Digital “Thank you” page on the Bard’s website 

 

Bard's Beer Logo Hat ($40)

Wear your Bard's Backer status with pride with this high-quality twill hat!  Gray twill with the  Bard's Beer logo.  

  • Plus one (1) Bard's Beer sticker, suitable for sticking on your water bottle, laptop, vehicle or cooler!  
  • Plus - Your name on a Digital “Thank you” page on the Bard’s website 

 

Limited Edition Bard's Beer Shirt ($50)

This beautiful “Bard's Backer” Bard's t-shirt is a high quality, soft and comfortable t-shirt with the Bard's Beer logo on the front, and “Official Bard's Backer” on the back.  ONLY 200 of these will be made, and when they are gone, they are gone. 

  • Plus one (1) Bard's Beer sticker, suitable for sticking on your water bottle, laptop, vehicle or cooler!  
  • Plus - Your name on a Digital “Thank you” page on the Bard’s website 

 

Set Of 2 Bard's Beer Collectible Beer Glasses ($75)

These high quality, glass beer glasses will be a welcome addition to your home bar, and a chilled glass is the best way to enjoy your Bard's Beer!  Two of these 12oz glasses featuring the full-color Bard's Beer logo will be yours as a thank you for this donation level.

  • Plus one (1) Bard's Beer sticker, suitable for sticking on your water bottle, laptop, vehicle or cooler!  
  • Plus - Your name on a Digital “Thank you” page on the Bard’s website 

 

Bard's KC Pizza Party ($100)

If you are in the Kansas City area (Bard's headquarters) and love pizza, then this perk is for you!  We'll be hosting an amazing Gluten-Free pizza bash at Summit Pizza in Lee's Summit. (Formerly Waldo pizza)  This bash will include gluten-free appetizers, gluten-free pizza, gluten-free desserts, games and prizes, and of course plenty of Bard's Beer, the Truly Gluten Free™ beer!  

  • Plus one (1) Bard's Beer sticker, suitable for sticking on your water bottle, laptop, vehicle or cooler!  
  • Plus - Your name on a Digital “Thank you” page on the Bard’s website 

 

Bard’s “World Famous Kansas City BBQ” Party ($150)

Another big bash for our many fans in the Kansas City area (Bard's headquarters) OR for those who are itching for an excuse to do an AMAZING road trip!  We’ll be hosting a private event featuring plenty of world famous Kansas City BBQ from Q39 (Yes, Bard’s Beer is available at Q39!)   This bash will include gluten-free appetizers, gluten-free BBQ, games and prizes, and of course plenty of Bard's Beer, the Truly Gluten-Free™ beer!  

  • Plus one (1) Bard's Beer sticker, suitable for sticking on your water bottle, laptop, vehicle or cooler!  
  • Plus - Your name on a Digital “Thank you” page on the Bard’s website 

 

Bard’s Backer Couples Swag Bundle ($275)

Want to share your love of Bard’s Beer with a special someone? Get two (2) of each awesome Bard’s swag item above. This includes: a set of four (4) Bard's Beer Logo Stickers, two (2) Bard's Beer Can Coozies, two (2) Bard's Beer Logo Gaiter Face Masks, two (2) Bard's Beer Logo Hats, two (2) Limited Edition Bard's Beer Shirts, set of four (4) Bard's Beer Collectible Beer Glasses.

  • Plus - Your name on a Digital “Thank you” page on the Bard’s website 

 

Bard’s Backyard Party ($750)

Party it up with Bard’s and swag sent to YOUR location to throw a big party for up to 10 of your best friends!  This will include enough world famous Kansas City BBQ from Jack Stack and Bard's Beer to keep your friends happy.  You can pair this with a football game, holiday event or “just because” event. 

  • Includes plenty Bard's swag, including stickers, can coozies and a shirt and hat for the host!
  • Plus - Your name on a Digital “Thank you” page on the Bard’s website 

Bard's Beer Tasting Advisory Board ($2,500)

This is your chance to be part of the team to actually be on the forefront of the next beer movement...Truly Gluten-Free™!  As a member of the Tasting Advisory Board, you'll be part of helping to develop, taste, and name the NEXT variety of Bard's Beer!  Will it be an ale?  An IPA? A low-calorie beer?  YOU will help decide! Only 10 seats on the Bard's Beer Tasting Advisory Board available.  AND, a seat on the board, also gets you all the merch above!

  • Plus one of everything! This includes: one (1) Bard’s Beer Logo Sticker, one (1) Bard’s Beer Can Coozie, one (1) Bard’s Beer Logo Gaiter Face Mask, one (1) Bard’s Beer Logo Hat, one (1) Limited Edition Bard’s Beer Shirts, and one (1) Bard’s Beer Collectible Beer Glass.
  • Plus – Your name listed in a place of honor on a special “Bard's Beer Tasting Advisory Board” page on the bardsbeer.com website!

 

Bard's Beer Brewery Tour USA ($2,500)

Visit us in St. Louis, Missouri for an amazing Bard's Beer Brewery tour!  Includes:  Exclusive private tour of the brewery as Bard's Beer is being produced, private tastings, one night hotel accommodations near the brewery in St. Louis, ground transportation, and an amazing private dinner with the Bard's Team (including Bard's inventor, Craig Belser! (Airfare not included)

  • Plus one of everything! This includes: one (1) Bard’s Beer Logo Sticker, one (1) Bard’s Beer Can Coozie, one (1) Bard’s Beer Logo Gaiter Face Mask, one (1) Bard’s Beer Logo Hat, one (1) Limited Edition Bard’s Beer Shirts, and one (1) Bard’s Beer Collectible Beer Glass.
  • Plus - Your name on a Digital “Thank you” page on the Bard’s website 

 

Bard's Beer Brewery Tour CANADA ($2,500)

Visit us in Toronto, Canada for an amazing Bard's Beer Brewery tour! Includes: Exclusive private tour of the brewery as Bard's Beer is being produced, private tastings, one night hotel accommodations near the brewery in Toronto, ground transportation, and an amazing private dinner with the Bard's Canadian Distributor AND members of the Bard's Beer Canada Fan Club! (Airfare not included)

  • Plus one of everything! This includes: one (1) Bard’s Beer Logo Sticker, one (1) Bard’s Beer Can Coozie, one (1) Bard’s Beer Logo Gaiter Face Mask, one (1) Bard’s Beer Logo Hat, one (1) Limited Edition Bard’s Beer Shirts, and one (1) Bard’s Beer Collectible Beer Glass.
  • Plus - Your name on a Digital “Thank you” page on the Bard’s website 

 

Bard's Beer Brewery Tour PLUS Advisory Board Membership ($4,500)

You can be the ULTIMATE “Bard's Backer” by joining our Tasting Advisory board AND joining us in either St. Louis or Toronto for the private brewery tour!  All of the perks of the private tour, all of the perks of the Board membership, and all of the Bard's swag you can carry!

  • Plus one of everything! This includes: one (1) Bard’s Beer Logo Sticker, one (1) Bard’s Beer Can Coozie, one (1) Bard’s Beer Logo Gaiter Face Mask, one (1) Bard’s Beer Logo Hat, one (1) Limited Edition Bard’s Beer Shirts, and one (1) Bard’s Beer Collectible Beer Glass.
  • Plus – Your name listed in a place of honor on a special “Bard's Beer Tasting Advisory Board” page on the bardsbeer.com website!

Can't get that from a bank loan!How you can helpAs special Thank You for your support, we have exclusive perks in every range, up to and including a trip to our new contract brewers in St. Louis, Missouri OR Toronto, Canada to watch Bard's coming off the line, tasting and testing the batch before it's shipped...and even an opportunity to join us as a member of the Bard's Tasting Advisory Board, where you can help us develop, name and taste the NEWEST style of Bard's Beer!We need to raise at least $65,000 to cover all of the costs of getting both brewers set up and start to see Bard's flowing to the thirsty marketplace.If we don't hit that goal, we can still get set up with at least one of the two brewers, and continue to try our best to keep up with demands from stores and distributors.  We really hope that doesn't happen though, because once a retailer places an order, and we can't ship...well, they are pretty unforgiving about that, and there may never be another order from them again.  Bard's Backer PerksIMPORTANT NOTE ABOUT PERKS: All of the custom logo perks featured for this campaign were sourced from a company in Roseburg, Oregon, a small town in Southwestern Oregon. Roseburg has been mostly safe from the fires that have devastated the Pacific Northwest as of late, however MANY evacuees have been forced to seek shelter in small towns such as Roseburg. We wanted to let you know that your support of this Bard's Beer campaign will ALSO help support wildfire relief efforts, as the company has been heavily involved in supporting and taking care of evacuees during this difficult time. Thank you for your support! Digital Thank You ($5)Your name on a Digital “Bard's Backer” thank you page on the Bard’s website. Bard's Beer Stickers ($10)
A set of two (2) Bard's Beer logo stickers, suitable for sticking on your water bottle, laptop, vehicle or cooler!  
Plus - Your name on a Digital “Thank you” page on the Bard’s website 
 Bard's Beer Can Coozie ($20)This beautiful, collapsible can Coozie will keep your Bard's Beer cold...and do it in STYLE with a unique sublimated “Bubbles of Bard's Beer” background, along with the official Bard's Beer logo front and center. 
Plus one (1) Bard's Beer sticker, suitable for sticking on your water bottle, laptop, vehicle or cooler!  
Plus - Your name on a Digital “Thank you” page on the Bard’s website 
 Bard's Beer Logo Gaiter Face Mask ($30)Show your “Gluten Freedom” with this stylish, rules-compliant neck gaiter, which can be used as a face mask, plus more than a dozen other uses!   (Headband, balaclava, neckerchief, scarf, bandanna, you can even use it as an arm sling in an emergency!)
Plus one (1) Bard's Beer sticker, suitable for sticking on your water bottle, laptop, vehicle or cooler!  
Plus - Your name on a Digital “Thank you” page on the Bard’s website 
 Bard's Beer Logo Hat ($40)Wear your Bard's Backer status with pride with this high-quality twill hat!  Gray twill with the  Bard's Beer logo.  
Plus one (1) Bard's Beer sticker, suitable for sticking on your water bottle, laptop, vehicle or cooler!  
Plus - Your name on a Digital “Thank you” page on the Bard’s website 
 Limited Edition Bard's Beer Shirt ($50)This beautiful “Bard's Backer” Bard's t-shirt is a high quality, soft and comfortable t-shirt with the Bard's Beer logo on the front, and “Official Bard's Backer” on the back.  ONLY 200 of these will be made, and when they are gone, they are gone. 
Plus one (1) Bard's Beer sticker, suitable for sticking on your water bottle, laptop, vehicle or cooler!  
Plus - Your name on a Digital “Thank you” page on the Bard’s website 
 Set Of 2 Bard's Beer Collectible Beer Glasses ($75)These high quality, glass beer glasses will be a welcome addition to your home bar, and a chilled glass is the best way to enjoy your Bard's Beer!  Two of these 12oz glasses featuring the full-color Bard's Beer logo will be yours as a thank you for this donation level.
Plus one (1) Bard's Beer sticker, suitable for sticking on your water bottle, laptop, vehicle or cooler!  
Plus - Your name on a Digital “Thank you” page on the Bard’s website 
 Bard's KC Pizza Party ($100)If you are in the Kansas City area (Bard's headquarters) and love pizza, then this perk is for you!  We'll be hosting an amazing Gluten-Free pizza bash at Summit Pizza in Lee's Summit. (Formerly Waldo pizza)  This bash will include gluten-free appetizers, gluten-free pizza, gluten-free desserts, games and prizes, and of course plenty of Bard's Beer, the Truly Gluten Free™ beer!  
Plus one (1) Bard's Beer sticker, suitable for sticking on your water bottle, laptop, vehicle or cooler!  
Plus - Your name on a Digital “Thank you” page on the Bard’s website 
 Bard’s “World Famous Kansas City BBQ” Party ($150)Another big bash for our many fans in the Kansas City area (Bard's headquarters) OR for those who are itching for an excuse to do an AMAZING road trip!  We’ll be hosting a private event featuring plenty of world famous Kansas City BBQ from Q39 (Yes, Bard’s Beer is available at Q39!)   This bash will include gluten-free appetizers, gluten-free BBQ, games and prizes, and of course plenty of Bard's Beer, the Truly Gluten-Free™ beer!  
Plus one (1) Bard's Beer sticker, suitable for sticking on your water bottle, laptop, vehicle or cooler!  
Plus - Your name on a Digital “Thank you” page on the Bard’s website 
 Bard’s Backer Couples Swag Bundle ($275)Want to share your love of Bard’s Beer with a special someone? Get two (2) of each awesome Bard’s swag item above. This includes: a set of four (4) Bard's Beer Logo Stickers, two (2) Bard's Beer Can Coozies, two (2) Bard's Beer Logo Gaiter Face Masks, two (2) Bard's Beer Logo Hats, two (2) Limited Edition Bard's Beer Shirts, set of four (4) Bard's Beer Collectible Beer Glasses.Plus - Your name on a Digital “Thank you” page on the Bard’s website  Bard’s Backyard Party ($750)Party it up with Bard’s and swag sent to YOUR location to throw a big party for up to 10 of your best friends!  This will include enough world famous Kansas City BBQ from Jack Stack and Bard's Beer to keep your friends happy.  You can pair this with a football game, holiday event or “just because” event. 
Includes plenty Bard's swag, including stickers, can coozies and a shirt and hat for the host!
Plus - Your name on a Digital “Thank you” page on the Bard’s website 
Bard's Beer Tasting Advisory Board ($2,500)This is your chance to be part of the team to actually be on the forefront of the next beer movement...Truly Gluten-Free™!  As a member of the Tasting Advisory Board, you'll be part of helping to develop, taste, and name the NEXT variety of Bard's Beer!  Will it be an ale?  An IPA? A low-calorie beer?  YOU will help decide! Only 10 seats on the Bard's Beer Tasting Advisory Board available.  AND, a seat on the board, also gets you all the merch above!
Plus one of everything! This includes: one (1) Bard’s Beer Logo Sticker, one (1) Bard’s Beer Can Coozie, one (1) Bard’s Beer Logo Gaiter Face Mask, one (1) Bard’s Beer Logo Hat, one (1) Limited Edition Bard’s Beer Shirts, and one (1) Bard’s Beer Collectible Beer Glass.
Plus – Your name listed in a place of honor on a special “Bard's Beer Tasting Advisory Board” page on the bardsbeer.com website!
 Bard's Beer Brewery Tour USA ($2,500)Visit us in St. Louis, Missouri for an amazing Bard's Beer Brewery tour!  Includes:  Exclusive private tour of the brewery as Bard's Beer is being produced, private tastings, one night hotel accommodations near the brewery in St. Louis, ground transportation, and an amazing private dinner with the Bard's Team (including Bard's inventor, Craig Belser! (Airfare not included)
Plus one of everything! This includes: one (1) Bard’s Beer Logo Sticker, one (1) Bard’s Beer Can Coozie, one (1) Bard’s Beer Logo Gaiter Face Mask, one (1) Bard’s Beer Logo Hat, one (1) Limited Edition Bard’s Beer Shirts, and one (1) Bard’s Beer Collectible Beer Glass.
Plus - Your name on a Digital “Thank you” page on the Bard’s website 
 Bard's Beer Brewery Tour CANADA ($2,500)Visit us in Toronto, Canada for an amazing Bard's Beer Brewery tour! Includes: Exclusive private tour of the brewery as Bard's Beer is being produced, private tastings, one night hotel accommodations near the brewery in Toronto, ground transportation, and an amazing private dinner with the Bard's Canadian Distributor AND members of the Bard's Beer Canada Fan Club! (Airfare not included)
Plus one of everything! This includes: one (1) Bard’s Beer Logo Sticker, one (1) Bard’s Beer Can Coozie, one (1) Bard’s Beer Logo Gaiter Face Mask, one (1) Bard’s Beer Logo Hat, one (1) Limited Edition Bard’s Beer Shirts, and one (1) Bard’s Beer Collectible Beer Glass.
Plus - Your name on a Digital “Thank you” page on the Bard’s website 
 Bard's Beer Brewery Tour PLUS Advisory Board Membership ($4,500)You can be the ULTIMATE “Bard's Backer” by joining our Tasting Advisory board AND joining us in either St. Louis or Toronto for the private brewery tour!  All of the perks of the private tour, all of the perks of the Board membership, and all of the Bard's swag you can carry!
Plus one of everything! This includes: one (1) Bard’s Beer Logo Sticker, one (1) Bard’s Beer Can Coozie, one (1) Bard’s Beer Logo Gaiter Face Mask, one (1) Bard’s Beer Logo Hat, one (1) Limited Edition Bard’s Beer Shirts, and one (1) Bard’s Beer Collectible Beer Glass.
Plus – Your name listed in a place of honor on a special “Bard's Beer Tasting Advisory Board” page on the bardsbeer.com website!

story:
Authentic Middle Eastern-style coffee is now just a button’s push away.

 

Meet Zou Zou - Australia’s first coffee machine for creating delicious and authentic Turkish, Lebanese or Greek-style coffee in a new and convenient way.


 

CONVENIENT

No more waiting by the stovetop

When friends and family are over, be free to enjoy and entertain instead of waiting by the stovetop. Zou Zou is efficient and mess-free, giving you time for what really counts.

 

CONSISTENT

Your coffee, just as you like it

With Zou Zou, coffee is always consistent. It can prepare up to ten cups at a time, with every cup as perfect as the last.

 

AUTHENTIC

A fresh take on a rich tradition

Zou Zou is designed to suit the modern lifestyle, without compromising on the delicious and authentic taste and texture that we all love.

Innovative Design


Choose your mode

There are 3 modes - Automatic Mode makes your coffee with the ideal crema at the push of a button, while Manual Mode allows you to boil the coffee multiple times to your liking, as you would on a stovetop.
 

Rinse Mode makes cleaning easy and mess-free. Just place your container under the spout and press start.


 

Stylish and robust

Zou Zou's streamlined stainless steel design makes it a stylish household appliance, while also being durable enough to hold up under the pressures of a commercial hospitality environment.


Keeping with traditions

Whether in the comfort of the family home, or at a picturesque cafe along a bustling street, coffee is always present. Its rich aroma and unforgettable taste spark vibrant conversations and evoke cheerful memories.

Zou Zou was born out of a love for traditional Turkish, Lebanese, and Greek-style coffee — a technique that has bridged different countries and cultures, and brought together family and friends for generations. Our mission is to see this unique style and flavour carry on and reach future generations of coffee lovers.

Meet Our Team

Joseph Atallah

Designer & Inventor

Meet Joseph — the founder and inventor of Zou Zou. Originally from Lebanon, Joseph has worked as a chocolatier and in food science, both in Australia and abroad, for over 30 years.

From manufacturing soaps and fragrances to producing ice creams and gourmet chocolates, Joseph’s experience is vast. His Turkish coffee-enriched heritage and his passion for food science led him to develop Zou Zou, named after Joseph’s childhood nickname.

“After years of development and rigorous testing here in Sydney, Australia, our team has created what we believe is the easiest way of making traditional Turkish coffee. It was important to us that we honour the tradition and experience of Turkish-style coffee, whilst also simplifying the process.” —Joseph

Development Team

Sydney, Australia

Industrial Designer

Electronics & Software Developer

Digital / Marketing Agency

Manufacturing Company


What's in the box

  • Zou Zou Coffee Machine
  • Large Stainless Steel Coffee Jug
  • Cleaning Brush
  • Removable Drip Tray
  • 240V or 110V Power Cord


Committment to Sustainability

At Zou Zou, we care about building a sustainable future. Our manufacturing processes are carefully considered to reduce unnecessary use of resources.

Zou Zou is made predominantly from stainless steel, instead of plastic, to ensure a durable, long-lasting appliance. And Zou Zou’s packaging is made almost entirely from recycled cardboard, avoiding the use of polystyrene.


Production Timeline

Zou Zou has just completed the final stage of prototyping and testing, and is now heading into manufacturing in Sydney, Australia. We are working with a trusted and experienced product manufacturer with a large-scale facility.

We’re proud to say that Zou Zou will start manufacturing in the coming few months regardless of whether or not we meet our financial goal on Indiegogo.


Shipping

We’ll be shipping to the selection of countries listed below. This list may change at any stage. If your country isn't listed, please contact us if you're interested and we can look at making Zou Zou available to you.

For additional peace-of-mind, we guarantee that Zou Zou will go into manufacturing regardless of whether or not we meet our financial goal on Indiegogo.

Ready to Ship from March 2021

Rates & Estimated Shipping Times

For single Zou Zou coffee machine

  • Australia: $55, 5-7 Days
  • New Zealand: $61, 5-10 Days
  • UK: $77, 10-15 Days
  • Lebanon: $88, 10-15 Days
  • Israel: $88, 10-15 Days
  • Jordan: $88, 10-15 Days
  • Egypt: $88, 10-15 Days
  • Saudi Arabia: $88, 10-15 Days
  • UAE: $88, 10-15 Days
  • USA: $165, 4-7 Days
  • Canada: $165, 4-7 Days
  • Germany: $182, 4-7 Days
  • Indonesia: $187, 10-15 Days
  • France: $204, 10-15 Days
  • Netherlands: $204, 10-15 Days
  • Switzerland: $204, 10-15 Days
  • Italy: $204, 10-15 Days
  • Spain: $204, 10-15 Days
  • Poland: $231, 7-12 Days
  • Greece: $242, 4-14 Days
  • Belgium: $242, 4-7 Days
  • Austria: $242, 4-7 Days
  • Turkey: $253, 15-25 Days
  • Russia: $275, 5-7 Days
  • Ukraine: $303, 5-7 Days
 

Rates will be higher for Zou Zou Duo pre-orders, and significantly lower for Zou Zou Coffee Jugs. Please follow the prompts to pre-order, to see accurate shipping rates for your country.


1% to OzHarvest

We’re proud to say that 1% of all money raised through Indiegogo will be donated to OzHarvest — an organization we really believe in! They’re making a huge difference in food security by providing food to those who need it most, both in Australia and around the world.

Every dollar raised by OzHarvest equals two whole meals, so for every Zou Zou pre-ordered, you're providing at least 12 meals to people in need.


Reach Us

Thanks for your interest in Zou Zou! If there’s anything we haven’t covered, please feel free to contact us. Due to our small (yet committed) team and the high number of enquiries, please expect a slight delay in us responding to you.

General Enquiries: info@zouzoucoffee.com

Investment, Distribution or Business Enquiries: joseph@zouzoucoffee.com

Disclaimer

Please note that all images and videos of Zou Zou are of prototypes and are not of the final production model. Details and dimensions are subject to change. Any estimated shipping times are a guide only and are subject to change.

This campaign, including all content, video, photography and brand design is by Keep It Frank.

© Copyright Zou Zou Coffee Pty Ltd. ABN 90 636 420 847. All rights reserved.

story:
(The design is ready!  We just need your help for our 100% sustainable packaging)

 

ABOUT US

 

We create small batches of award winning craft chocolate from our micro factory in Stoke on Trent. UK.

Every process, from the moment the cacao beans arrive at our kitchen (from origins such as Peru & West Papua) is overseen by founder & head chocolate maker James Walter.

After spending 20 years as an award winning chef in the hotel and restaurant industry, James always held the belief that his passion for fine flavour & food chemistry would one day guide him down a slightly different path.

The ultra premium cacao we use to make our chocolate, is sourced directly by us from small farms & cooperatives from around the equator, ensuring the best possible price for the farmers in some of the world's poorest regions.  This is known as direct trade.

We operate a zero child slavery policy when sourcing our cacao, unlike many of the larger well known brands.

Fair trade isn't necessarily fair when it comes to child slavery in the chocolate industry. You can check here for ethical chocolate makers by clicking here - Food Empowerment Project and Slave Free Chocolate.

Our belief in ethically sourcing through direct trade ensures transparency within the whole supply chain.

By paying a premium price, this helps the farmers to continue growing cacao (considered a reforestation crop), which in turn helps improves biodiversity, whilst also creating positive social impacts within these farming communities.

 

(We met cacao farmer Luis Mancini in 2017 at the start of our chocolate making journey)

 

RECYCLING FACTS

 

  • Recycling rates are increasing in the UK, but so is our population.

 

  • British households create over 26 million tonnes of waste each year.

 

  • This means that the average person in the UK throws away around 400kg of waste each year; 7 times their body weight.

​

  • It takes 70% less energy to recycle paper than it does to make it new from raw materials.​

 

  • Recycling everything you could in your kitchen recycling bins could power a TV for six months, plenty of time to binge watch your favourite programme!​

​

At Seed Chocolate we are very conscious of our responsibility toward the environment.

Our new eco packaging is the first step of many.  From reforestation, to running a weather dependent neutral carbon micro factory, we want to grow organically & ethically.

So whilst tasting great, It's helping the planet also!

 

(Cacao pods grow on the trunk, unlike other crops around the world)

 

WHAT WE NEED - OUR CAMPAIGN

 

Eco packaging to match our award winning ethical chocolate.

 

Our Indiegogo campaign is for £8,000.  This is needed to invest in: 

  • 100% zero waste & biodegradable packaging.  Recycled cardboard outer.  Compostable inner pouch.  Plant based inks.  No Glue.
  • Small marketing opportunities.  UK & Staffordshire based.

We are extremely conscious of our carbon footprint.  We currently use FSC certified boxes, and also pop our own popcorn for inner packaging when shipping our chocolate & cocoa products.

We are aiming to raise as much as possible, to help us stand toe to toe with our bean to bar competitors.

The design is ready.  The COVID-19 pandemic stalled our plans, so now we need a little help to get this project over the line.

 

EVERY £ COUNTS!!!

 

As a small business, this investment really will help the long term future of Seed Chocolate, helping us to grow + scale sustainably. 

More chocolate = a better world.

If we are unfortunate & fail to reach our goal of £8,000 then we aim to invest all of the raised funds into a scaled down version, to help us compete more sustainably.

 

COLLABORATIONS

 

We currently collaborate with some fantastic independent businesses in the UK.

  • Castletown Distillery, Staffordshire.
  • The Flintlock Restaurant, Staffordshire.
  • Simpsons Restaurant, Birmingham.

We are also proud cocoa bean suppliers to award winning Chocao Gin Liqueur.

(A mock up of our proposed packaging)

 

OUR INGREDIENTS

 

We pride ourselves on using the finest organic ingredients.  Some are even foraged, fermented, pickled or dehydrated by head chocolate maker James Walter, to show off a range of flavour profiles that work in harmony with fine chocolate. 

True sustainable ingredients sourced in & around the UK.

Our award winning chocolate is 100% FREE FROM soy & palm oil.

 

 

AWARDS & RECOGNITION

 

This attention to detail has helped us achieve recognition and numerous awards from the following:

The International Chocolate Awards - Silver, European, Africa & Middle East category (2019).

The Guild of Fine Food (Great Taste Awards) - 2 stars (2020, 2019), 1 star (2020, 2018).

The Academy of Chocolate Awards - Silver (2019), Bronze (2018).

Great Taste Club

Taste of Staffordshire Awards (Enjoy Staffordshire) - Winner Specialist Food & Drink Retailer of the Year (2018).

 

 

EXCLUSIVE PERKS

 

To help us to achieve our goal, we are offering some amazing perks & exclusive experiences for Indiegogo customers only.  

COVID-19 MEASURES WILL BE IMPLEMENTED ON SELECTED CHOCOLATE EXPERIENCES IN ALIGNMENT WITH GOVERNMENT GUIDELINES.

Experiences to be held in Newcastle-under-Lyme, Staffordshire.  UK.

 

 

SHARE ON SOCIAL MEDIA

 

Other Ways You Can Help

 

We understand that some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean you can't help:

 

  • Please help our campaign by sharing with your family and friends.  

 

  • You may use the Indiegogo share tools (above & next to the follow icon) to post on Facebook, Twitter or by email. 

 

  • Shop for our chocolate!  Visit our website www.seedchocolate.com to shop for chocolate & online events.

 

(The design is ready!  We just need your help for our 100% sustainable packaging)

 

WHAT IF WE SURPASS OUR FUNDING GOAL?

We have a couple of "stretch" goals/options for our fundraising campaign.

 

  • Improved chocolate making equipment & machinery.
  • Larger micro factory premises.  We already have the painter & decorator to call on in the family.
  • Food & drink premises - chocolate cafe by day, fine natural wines by night.  Location - Staffordshire
  • Product development.  Such as spreads, oils & snacks.
  • Bulk shipments of new origins of cacao variety for a future chocolate range.  We have the farmers/origins lined up, ready & waiting.

 

 

 

 

Thank you for your time & support

 

James

 

 

Founder & Chocolate Maker - Seed Chocolate
