story:
Hello, we’re oLivery. Olive oil made easy

We bottle the best Italian olive oil and deliver it to you whenever you need it. Quickly, simply and deliciously.

The bottle is re-usable and you can refill it by ordering a refill pack for less than 10 euros. The refill will be delivered through your letterbox so no need to stay home.

 

 

 

 

 

 

Smart Bottle

oLivery is the world’s very first olive oil in a Smart Bottle. From now on, you’ll never have to worry about your olive oil supply anymore. When your bottle is almost empty, the LED light changes from green to red and the chip sends a Bluetooth message to our mobile app, oLi. oLi asks if you’d like to order some more oil and then sends us a message if you do. Your order is then delivered in a sustainable refill pack that fits neatly through your letterbox, and, if you order before 17.00, your new oil will be on your doormat the following day.

Swiss UV-glass

Our smart bottle is made from Violettglass, a special type of light reflecting glass for a very good reason. Our friends at the engineering agency Miron in Switzerland did research into the behaviour of light in glass and it’s effect on the contents inside. They concluded that not all colours of the light spectrum cause fruit and veg to oxidise and, in fact, violet and infrared slow down the aging process. So Miron have helped us create a bottle that blocks all colours except these two. This special black glass means your oLivery oil stays perfect for up to six months. Just remember to screw the cap back on after.

Refill pack

At the moment, our refill pack is made from recyclable plastic – currently the best solution for sending olive oil by post. We’re working on two different possible solutions - plastic from recycled plastic and plastic from organic and compostable material (meaning you can recycle the packaging with all your other garden and kitchen waste). While both these packaging solutions are new for oil, they’ve been proven to work brilliantly with other food. So we’ve got a good feeling we’ll have a better solution in the not to distant future. We’re hoping to finish this project very soon but in the meantime, please recycle your refill pack with your other plastic waste.

Why do we use plastic instead of glass? Well, plastic is far more energy efficient for a start. To make or even recycle glass, you need to heat it to very high temperatures which increases the carbon footprint. Glass is also impractical and heavy to transport. Our refill pack is light, needs very little material to protect what’s inside and can be delivered through regular post.

It’s far more efficient and environmentally friendly than parcel deliveries or buying your oil from the supermarket. So olive oil in the post is the way forward. We’ve also designed our refill pack so that you can squeeze every last drop of oil into your bottle. Zero waste, maximum taste. Glass bottles leave between 6 and 14% of the product in packaging.

 

 

1. Hello

Register at oLivery, download our app oLi and make your first order via the app or our website. Once we’ve received your order, we’ll send your Smart Bottle and your first refill pack. Then you just fill up the bottle, link it to your smart phone via Bluetooth and that’s it. Cook away without worrying if you’re down to your last drop.  

 

2. Beep-Beep

Once you’ve used 80% of your oil, the chip in your bottle sends a Bluetooth message to our app oLi and asks if you’d like to order some more oil. Simply click OK to confirm and you’re done. Enjoy the rest of your cooking.

As soon as we receive your confirmation, our logistics centre automatically sends you a new refill pack. Order before 17.00 and your new refill pack will arrive the next day, for less than 10 euros.

What’s more, the refill pack will be delivered through your letterbox so no need to stay home and wait for the delivery man.

And just in case you were worrying, your Smart Bottle has a Bluetooth connection with your phone - not a 24/7 direct hot line to us. That kind of George Orwell 1984 business would freak us out too.

 

3. DIY

Having a big family dinner? Organising the summer school barbecue? Or just need more oil for whatever you’re cooking? You can take charge of your own olive oil supplies by clicking on the app for an extra refill. We’ll make sure to send it that same day. 

Click, click, go. It’s that simple.

 

 

Always having enough oil is only worthwhile if it’s the very best oil there is. 

Luckily, oLivery oil is just that. 

Our extra virgin olive oil is made from cold pressed olives in Puglia in the South Italy. In the middle of Puglia, you’ll find the Gargano National Park, a protected nature reserve of great beauty. The soil there is full of minerals and Gargano also happens to enjoy 300+ sunny days as well as a light sea breeze. Olive tree heaven, basically. The olives from this region are small yet packed with flavour making them ideal for top-notch olive oil.

 

 

Our olive oil is 100% pure nature. The olives are harvested when they are fully ripe and pressed immediately in order to preserve all the flavour and healthy antioxidants. After pressing, the oil is then filtered and spun so no water or pulp is left. No pulp and no water means you can heat your oil up to 260°C without it getting smoky or splashy. Grilling happiness awaits...

You can use oLivery oil for everything from grilling to dressings, from cooking to dipping – anything requiring excellent olive oil. And if for whatever reason, you don’t like our oil, you can send it back and we’ll refund you your money immediately. No questions asked.

 

 

After finishing his high school diploma, 17 year old Ridder had no idea what he wanted to be when he grew up. His dad told him to go and find a job and, being the adventurous sort, Ridder left home in a battered old Fiat to find work in the olive orchards of his beloved Italy. Three years later, he came home, minus the Fiat, but full of knowledge about olives, oil, recipes and enthusiasm. Ridder went on to found Liquido d’Oro in 2009 and successfully launched online olive oil in twelve countries across Europe. 

Whilst checking a crowdfunding campaign, Ridder heard about these things called clever chips and it got him thinking. Could these chips be used to help people have the very best olive oil whenever they needed it? 

He asked a few entrepreneurial friends to think about this new model with him and together with a marketeer, business guru, sales brain, logistics specialist and one very tall creative, Ridder set up oLivery.

 

Not everything in this world is running as smoothly as it should be. We’d like to do our part in changing that. At oLivery, we believe in the 10% model. If all companies in the world set aside 10% of their profits for good, then almost anything can be solved, right? 

Our 10% goes to refugee children in the South of Italy where our oil comes from. We believe that all kids have the right to a proper education, no matter where they are or how they ended up there. Every kid deserves the opportunity to learn to read, write and gain other useful skills so that they can go on do even greater things when they grow up.

 

 

 

 

 

We’ve got the oil. We’ve got clever bottles. So now, we need your help to start our first production run. Email us at lonneke@olivery.com or send us a private message on Indiegogo.

Pre-order your own bottle today and help make this project reality. 

 

Risks and challenges

With years of experience in producing Italian extra virgin olive oil, product design, product testing, e-commerce and logistics we are confident that we can deliver a perfect olive oil bottle to you based on the timeline defined in our campaign. We already have a first sample set of bottles and refills which are being tested as we speak.

We have gathered reliable and trustworthy manufacturer that always leads the way in innovation. Our production partner has years of experience in developing and producing industrial weighing electronics.

Over the past five years, we have produced thousands of olive oil bottles and shipped them all over the world. We will ship oLivery from distribution centers in The Netherlands and the US.

We will keep you posted 
Is there nothing that can go wrong? Of course there is: setbacks, such as delays in our production process, can always occur. However, we will always find a solution.

Grilling happiness awaits...You can use oLivery oil for everything from grilling to dressings, from cooking to dipping – anything requiring excellent olive oil. And if for whatever reason, you don’t like our oil, you can send it back and we’ll refund you your money immediately. No questions asked.  After finishing his high school diploma, 17 year old Ridder had no idea what he wanted to be when he grew up. His dad told him to go and find a job and, being the adventurous sort, Ridder left home in a battered old Fiat to find work in the olive orchards of his beloved Italy. Three years later, he came home, minus the Fiat, but full of knowledge about olives, oil, recipes and enthusiasm. Ridder went on to found Liquido d’Oro in 2009 and successfully launched online olive oil in twelve countries across Europe. Whilst checking a crowdfunding campaign, Ridder heard about these things called clever chips and it got him thinking. Could these chips be used to help people have the very best olive oil whenever they needed it? He asked a few entrepreneurial friends to think about this new model with him and together with a marketeer, business guru, sales brain, logistics specialist and one very tall creative, Ridder set up oLivery. Not everything in this world is running as smoothly as it should be. We’d like to do our part in changing that. At oLivery, we believe in the 10% model. If all companies in the world set aside 10% of their profits for good, then almost anything can be solved, right? Our 10% goes to refugee children in the South of Italy where our oil comes from. We believe that all kids have the right to a proper education, no matter where they are or how they ended up there. Every kid deserves the opportunity to learn to read, write and gain other useful skills so that they can go on do even greater things when they grow up.     We’ve got the oil. We’ve got clever bottles. So now, we need your help to start our first production run. Email us at lonneke@olivery.com or send us a private message on Indiegogo.Pre-order your own bottle today and help make this project reality.  Risks and challengesWith years of experience in producing Italian extra virgin olive oil, product design, product testing, e-commerce and logistics we are confident that we can deliver a perfect olive oil bottle to you based on the timeline defined in our campaign. We already have a first sample set of bottles and refills which are being tested as we speak.We have gathered reliable and trustworthy manufacturer that always leads the way in innovation. Our production partner has years of experience in developing and producing industrial weighing electronics.Over the past five years, we have produced thousands of olive oil bottles and shipped them all over the world. We will ship oLivery from distribution centers in The Netherlands and the US.We will keep you posted Is there nothing that can go wrong? Of course there is: setbacks, such as delays in our production process, can always occur. However, we will always find a solution.

story:
I'M HUGH CUMMING'S - Extreme Adventurer 

I WANT TO RAISE MONEY FOR MULTIPLE SCLEROSIS FOR THE ROCK AGAINST MS FOUNDATION - LET'S DO THIS AND MAKE AN IMPACT FOR THOSE THAT CAN'T!

Here is my story - I’m 33, have a degree in literature which has gone to little use outside of arguing about books. The last five years I've been designing and building commercial, film and TV sets… also started a design collective.

For the last two years I did a cross country motorcycle trip, attempted to climb mt. rainier (only made it to 13,500), kite boarding in the outer banks, burning man, rode my motorcycle through the biblical rains, ski, surf (horribly), fly fishing in Alaska, ran a tough mudder, and flipped my FJ40 onto my arm.

Then I saw this adventure of crossing Siberia to the Arctic Circle on a vintage Russian motorcycle with a side care.... This adventure I cannot refuse and I decided to us it for good! I want to raise money for the Rock Against MS Foundation - My new friend Nancy Sayle started this to help people NOW - She has Primary Progressive and has a hard life daily but never says a word of complaint - This brings us to here, right now - IF I can get people to support my trek across Siberia I know I can make a difference to people that suffer this horrible disease!

Just think of the impact YOU will make for a person that lost their ability to walk or get up in the morning - Being trapped in a body that beats itself up daily is one I cannot conceive SO I lend my crazy adventures to those who can't and to those that need!

What We Need & What You Get

Your donations will fund many cool things for this foundation to help those that need help NOW!

    ROCK AGAINST MS FOUNDATION will provide services from a three (3) program resource system, which will provide daily care, quality of life needs and emergency funding, while assisting people with multiple sclerosis (MS) to live independent and full lives. Additionally, a brick and mortar facility we will call THE ROCK HOUSE is in the planning stages, and will provide free of charge, multiple programs and opportunities designed to heal the mind, body and spirit of all those whose lives have been affected by MS.
    You can get this really cool shirt!
    OR and ALL-Star drum head signed by REALLY cool famous Rockstars!

    I will ALSO do a shout out to you via my video when I arrive and when I return - While on the ice I will not be able to scream for help! I mean communicate with the real world BUT you will be able to follow me and my miles on a special link I will provide you!
    Whether or not my goal is met it still goes into the program system to build and help people!

MORE info on my trip!


You, a crap antique Russian motorcycle and the biggest frozen lake in the world

This is the adventure that separates the men from the boys and the ladymen from the ladyboys.  Invasive cold, biblical remoteness, and a vehicle so notoriously temperamental it makes John McEnroe look like the Dalai Lama.  You'll need mechanical skill, navigation skill, and ideally, an enormous muff to keep your hands warm.  Oh, and massive kahunas, did we mention that already?

We have evacuated this adventure 4,000km east, to the biggest chunk of Siberian ice we could imagine; 636km by 80km, the incomparable Lake Baikal.  Beginning with spiked tyres on the south-east corner of the lake; you'll skid, glide, stutter and fly across the ice to Severbaikalsk in the north.

At this point I'll de-stud my wheels and the adventure will become like the Ice Run of old.I'll wend my way south through the Irkutsk Oblast, along frozen rivers, forest lined icy dirt tracks and paved roads buried under compacted snow. The ultimate test of my biking and adventuring prowess.

I should be at the starting point March 18th, 2015!! GET READY PEOPLE TO HELP ME CROSS THE ICE LAKE OF SIBERIA and RAISE MONEY TO HELP PEOPLE NOW!

Risks & Challenges

I think the above video shows you all MY challenges but the challenges for a person with progressive MS is one none of us can fathom. Meet Breea Rene - She is part of the Rock Against MS Foundation team - Here is her story - She wants you to understand why helping people NOW is needed NOW!

Multiple sclerosis is an autoimmune disease that affects the brain and spinal cord (central nervous system). Multiple sclerosis (MS), also known as "disseminated sclerosis" or " encephalomyelitis disseminata", is an inflammatory disease in which the fatty myelin sheaths covering nerves in the brain and spinal cord are attack. Multiple sclerosis affects 2.5 million people worldwide, including 400000 Americans. 


Other Ways You Can Help

 Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean you can't help:

  • PLEASE get the word out and make some noise about your campaign.
  • PLEASE use the Indiegogo share tools!

And that's all there is to it. PEACE & LOVE! OH and I will see you on the ICE RUN!

story:
Help us create an annual Norwich Chocolate Festival!  


If you love chocolate support our campaign.

                                                                      
                                 


My journey into the world of 'fine' artisan chocolate began several years ago.  Now director of Madame Deroubaix which sources and sells only the very best chocolate products, I also host chocolate tasting events and expeditions through Le Club de Cacao.  I want to share with others all that I have learnt and tasted along the way so that other people can embark on their own chocolate journey.
  
However we need your help to bring 'fine' chocolate to the general public in a fun and interactive way.  Supporting this campaign will ensure a FREE Chocolate Festival accessible to all that celebrates the diversity of chocolate with exhibitors showcasing single origin chocolate bars to chocolate jam.  Combined with demonstrations, activities, exhibitions and even our very own Chocolate Cake Bake Off! This festival is designed to be a family event, engaging all ages.


With your contributions towards the costs of hosting this festival we can make far reaching and long lasting changes that will benefit people across the world.


What We Need Funding For:

  • Hire of the Old Fire Station venue

  • Promotion/Advertising this includes the printing of leaflets, posters, banners and T Shirts.  As well as costs of accessing media coverage in local newspapers and radio.

  • Exhibition.  Displays will be created around the venue providing information and background around the impacts and issues surrounding the chocolate industry and chocolate heritage.  Funding will be needed to produce these displays.  

  • Activities.  

  • Exhibitor accommodation.  Our exhibitors are coming from all across the country for the weekend.

  • Travel costs for community involvement and social enterprise.  A key aim of the festival is to engage and support different social enterprise groups.  

  • Hire of technical equipment including speaker systems and mics.


What You Get:

  • However small your contribution you will automatically be entered into a prize draw for a hamper selection of ‘fine’ chocolate collated from festival exhibitors.

  • Access to a quiz to complete while exploring the festival.

  • Explore and invest in our range of exclusive perks for a win win situation, including a VIP launch night from 8pm.  The chance to support a new exciting event in Norwich that with your support now will ensure it continues into the future. 


The Impact

Over the last decade a growing movement has emerged that aims to ensure that flavour diversity in chocolate continues and grows.  This festival is part of that movement and with your support we will bring fine single origin chocolate to Norwich.  These flavours result from variations in bean type and quality, geographical origin and growing and processing conditions. 

Genetic diversity in cocoa beans is essential to growing more resilient cacao beans that can survive diseases, pests and changing local environments.  Therefore the future of the world cocoa economy, the livelihoods of individual workers (40-50 million people dependent on cocoa) and the chocolate supply we cherish is dependent on the value we place on maintaining genetic diversity. 

As a place steeped in chocolate heritage we want to put the chocolate back into Norwich, enhance Norwich's foodie atmosphere and facilitate local growth.  This Festival will allow both participants and visitors to learn from each other and encourage young people and children into a chocolate making world. 

By supporting this campaign you will support a community dedicated to improving and enriching all our lives.


Other Ways You Can Help
  • Put up a chocolatier - Many of our chocolatiers have given their time and expertise for free, if you would like to host them please let us know.
  • Get involved with the planning of this festival and those in the future – any assistance, whether skills or simply time, in making this festival a success would be welcomed.
  • Spread the word using the Indiegogo share tools, on social media e.g. Facebook and by word of mouth.  We want this first year to be as big a success as possible!
Most importantly CHOCS AWAY!  BEGIN YOUR CHOCOLATE JOURNEY TODAY.

story:
Short Summary

Hello and welcome to the Oregon Wine Garden Story. My name is Shawn and my wife Savenia and myself are the founders.  Oregon Wine Garden began in the wine tour business and a small wine tasting room/event space in Milwaukie Oregon. We learned about the passion and artistry of Oregon's Wine Makers and Growers who have grown the industry to 4th largest producer of wines in United States.

With having a great experienced staff and team from all walks of life and experiences in: events, wine tasting rooms and restaurants background along with transportation in the wine tour world we are excited about the Oregon Wine Garden.

Oregon Wine Garden is Oregon Cool, promotes Oregon, its Wines and Foods to Oregonians as well as visitors to our wonderful State. We help smaller wine producers who do not have distributors get a foot hold into the market place as well offer fan favorites from some of the larger producers.

We opened in late January 2015 and helped to create currently 15 new jobs and offer over 50 Oregon Wines on our way to hundreds. Fresh Foods, and Wine, Banquets and now a full bar all located on a beautiful Golf course in the Charbonneau District of Wilsonville minutes off Interstate 5. From this central location Oregon Wine Garden is within 30 minutes to over 200 wineries and downtown Portland.

We have been a part of a featured article in Oregon Wine Press magazine; won an award from Clackamas County Tourism; Mt Hood Territory for best new product 2015. OWG as friends call us is taking the next steps in creating more jobs, offering more Oregon Wines, (promoting all the wineries) and  continuing the dream of Oregon Cool. We hope you can join us and enjoying the fruits so to speak..Cheers!


What We Need & What You Get


We are working to finish the Wine Heritage Center featuring the history of Oregon Wine Industry, Outdoor Decks and Seating and Marketing.

In return for your participation YOU can choose from many benefits such as: a bottle of wine per month for a year. Or perhaps a wine tour, or even a private dinner for you and your friends.  


The Impact


Your participation has a positive impact for  OWG in creating  additional jobs, and helps in promoting Oregon Wineries, Food Vendors, Suppliers and best of all YOU having a great place to enjoy with friends and family. 

We understand some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean you can't help:

  • Please consider asking your friends and family to spread the word and make some noise about Oregon Wine Garden campaign.
  • Thank You from all the staff and team to you who have made OWG possible.

Cheers!

story:
PINK and BLUE - pure natural energy drinks

 

We're ready to go ! But, now we need your support !

We have spent countless hours in researching & developing these very special designed drinks and working hard with different food specialists, but finally we have something that we are very proud of ! We can’t wait for you to experience your first PINK and BLUE pure natural energy drink and tell all of your friends about it.

Now is the time that good enough isn´t enough, because when Quality and Passion meet something extraordinary is created.

With PINK the first drink development is already done and already paid by ourselves. We have tested the final taste with everyone we could find around us and the feedback was overwhelming. Now we are asked on a daily base, when the first drink is available - throughout the world !

So we have to take the next big step and we need your support to get PINK to our first large scale production run, which is about 10k € (comparable to 10k US$).

As you can imagine, as a small startup company we have to deal with big suppliers (ingredients and production equipment), which, you can imagine, is always a big challenge.

Give us the opportunity to live our dream by funding us! And we invite each one of you to become part of our PINK and BLUE community and to create the next generation of healthy dinks with pure natural energy - together. We can achieve something special !

If we reach more than the expected goal of 10k, you will also make the development of BLUE come through. Energy drink lovers around the world - be united and show your power.

 

 

Your search for the perfect drink is over

  • 100% pure natural ingredients
  • BIO and Vegan (certified)
  • Free of gluten and lactose
  • Reduced calories
  • No artificial, unhealty additives
  • Supports maximum performance
  • Great refreshing taste
  • Made in Germany

                

 

 

The Opportunity

PINK and BLUE is combining the megatrends healthy and mindful living, gender shift, individualisation and the power supply to your body for your maximum performance.

Instead of using bad tasting, artificial drinks to support todays fast-paced life, PINK and BLUE offers the best drinking experience according to your individual needs.

 

Megatrends

 

Healthy Living

Health is not the opposite of sickness anymore, it is even more the awareness for the balance of our individual lifestyle. Conscious and healthy living is the key of well being.

 

Gender Shift

A change within the current male dominated world is happening into a more balanced, emancipated life between men and women and the realization of personal and career goals with new relationship models.

 

Individualisation & Design

In a community which gives us more and more individual liberty, but at the same time pressing us more and more for decisions, values are changing and people are aiming for more individuality amongst the mainstream.

 

Target Groups

Millenials

•25-34  (targeting  20 +)
•Digital Natives
•Dual Identity (work at day | party at night)
•Embracing life to the max
•Impulsive
•Not looking for a Boss
•Entrepreneural Minded
•Highly Social
•Interested in sustainability

 

Gen-xers

•35-49  (targeting  30 +)
•Parents, Empty Nesters or DINKs
•Active | Fast-paced
•More health concerned
•Mentally and physically exhausted
•On-the-go
•Daily stressed
•Known as family „Superhero“
•Weekend warriors

 

... we're building a brand, with an essence of premium design

We build a true lifestyle brand by immersing ourselves, daily, into that lifestyle. To build a brand unlike any other in the category... where healthy living meets Californian design !

 

 

Risks & Challenges

Our primary risks are that the market is over saturated and the taste does not fit the expectation of the consumers. The clever marketing of the multi billion dollar companies is trying to split the market shares between only 3 companies, but the taste is perceived as chemical / artificial by most of the people. 

 

 

Market Expansion

The global energy drink market was worth USD 39.7 billion in 2013 and it is expected to reach USD 61.7 billion by 2021 at a CAGR of 5.8% over the forecast period. Besides the US market opportunity there is the fast growing Asian and African market. Additionally, due to our team’s deep roots in Europe, we are confident that smart European expansion will also be an important growth chance.

 

 

Timeline

We will have PINK and BLUE pure natural energy drinks ready just in time for you, wherever you are. So go ahead and support our dream to become reality.

 

We're ready to go ! But, now we need your support !

As PINK is already developed, we need your support to get to our first large scale production run. Give us the opportunity to make our dream become reality. We are just one small step away.

 

 

Other Ways You Can Help

You might not be able to support us with funds, but that doesn't mean you can't help:

Ask your friends to get the word out and make some noise about PINK and BLUE.

It would also help to use the share links at the top of the page to the social media platform of your choice !

Consider making a donation to Viva con Agua on your own and help those without access to clean water around the world. 

Thank you for reading and we hope you join us in making PINK and BLUE become reality!

 

            

 

Contact Us Directly

Got questions about PINK and BLUE ?

Email us at info@pink-blue.eu

Visit our Instagram page

Visit our Facebook page

Visit our Twitter page

 

 

A Special Thanks to...

Jacky Bourne — for being such a talented athlete and model

Felix Weinert - for being such a smart movie business man

Fabrice Weber — for being such a great videographer

Give us the opportunity to live our dream by funding us! And we invite each one of you to become part of our PINK and BLUE community and to create the next generation of healthy dinks with pure natural energy - together. We can achieve something special !
If we reach more than the expected goal of 10k, you will also make the development of BLUE come through. Energy drink lovers around the world - be united and show your power.
 
 
Your search for the perfect drink is over

100% pure natural ingredients
BIO and Vegan (certified)
Free of gluten and lactose
Reduced calories
No artificial, unhealty additives
Supports maximum performance
Great refreshing taste
Made in Germany

                 
 
 
The Opportunity
PINK and BLUE is combining the megatrends healthy and mindful living, gender shift, individualisation and the power supply to your body for your maximum performance.
Instead of using bad tasting, artificial drinks to support todays fast-paced life, PINK and BLUE offers the best drinking experience according to your individual needs.
 
Megatrends Healthy LivingHealth is not the opposite of sickness anymore, it is even more the awareness for the balance of our individual lifestyle. Conscious and healthy living is the key of well being. Gender ShiftA change within the current male dominated world is happening into a more balanced, emancipated life between men and women and the realization of personal and career goals with new relationship models. Individualisation & DesignIn a community which gives us more and more individual liberty, but at the same time pressing us more and more for decisions, values are changing and people are aiming for more individuality amongst the mainstream. Target Groups
Millenials

•25-34  (targeting  20 +)•Digital Natives•Dual Identity (work at day | party at night)•Embracing life to the max•Impulsive•Not looking for a Boss•Entrepreneural Minded•Highly Social•Interested in sustainability
 
Gen-xers

•35-49  (targeting  30 +)•Parents, Empty Nesters or DINKs•Active | Fast-paced•More health concerned•Mentally and physically exhausted•On-the-go•Daily stressed•Known as family „Superhero“•Weekend warriors
 
... we're building a brand, with an essence of premium design

We build a true lifestyle brand by immersing ourselves, daily, into that lifestyle. To build a brand unlike any other in the category... where healthy living meets Californian design !
 
 
Risks & Challenges
Our primary risks are that the market is over saturated and the taste does not fit the expectation of the consumers. The clever marketing of the multi billion dollar companies is trying to split the market shares between only 3 companies, but the taste is perceived as chemical / artificial by most of the people. 
  Market ExpansionThe global energy drink market was worth USD 39.7 billion in 2013 and it is expected to reach USD 61.7 billion by 2021 at a CAGR of 5.8% over the forecast period. Besides the US market opportunity there is the fast growing Asian and African market. Additionally, due to our team’s deep roots in Europe, we are confident that smart European expansion will also be an important growth chance.  TimelineWe will have PINK and BLUE pure natural energy drinks ready just in time for you, wherever you are. So go ahead and support our dream to become reality. We're ready to go ! But, now we need your support !As PINK is already developed, we need your support to get to our first large scale production run. Give us the opportunity to make our dream become reality. We are just one small step away.  Other Ways You Can HelpYou might not be able to support us with funds, but that doesn't mean you can't help:Ask your friends to get the word out and make some noise about PINK and BLUE.It would also help to use the share links at the top of the page to the social media platform of your choice !Consider making a donation to Viva con Agua on your own and help those without access to clean water around the world. Thank you for reading and we hope you join us in making PINK and BLUE become reality!                Contact Us DirectlyGot questions about PINK and BLUE ?Email us at info@pink-blue.euVisit our Instagram pageVisit our Facebook pageVisit our Twitter page  A Special Thanks to...Jacky Bourne — for being such a talented athlete and modelFelix Weinert - for being such a smart movie business manFabrice Weber — for being such a great videographer

story:
Our campaign

I always say technology can not be eaten so, some years ago, I decided to use technology to work on the basic thing every man has to face: the food. Joining the Italian creativity with modern techniques, we work on particular dehydrated foods that can be used in different situations for different purposes. Malnutrition, disaster relief, space missions, extreme environments, haute cuisine, anti-aging, are some of the areas where our foods can be used. We want to grow and study new solutions that can be applied to our products. We are raising funds but we also want to expand our team including researchers, professionals and people with particular ideas, from any country of the world, to work on new special dehydrated foods.

Here you are not only supporting our projects purchasing products, you are purchasing a ticket to work with us on products that we want to see on a lot of situations, from malnutrition to, in the next years, in the bag of the first men on Mars.

 

What are we speaking about?

Look at this video:

 

What you can help to realize

Look here to learn more about the first step of the project:

 

And after the first step...

Here what we want to do as second step:

 

The team

I'm Alberto. Here you can learn more about myself and my background.

 

And here other key people of the project.
This team must grow very fast and we want to see you here!

 

 

What We Need

We are raising funds for our projects, in 2 steps:

  1. through this campaign to purchase new advanced process equipments for our facility.
  2. through another campaign we will start soon, to restore historic buildings to create laboratories, work spaces and lodging for all our new team members.


 

What You Get

Supporting this campaign you will have the opportunity to be part of a project to create special foods for a lot of particular situations. But we are not asking you to donate, we are asking to purchase our tangible products and services listed in the perks section.


 

The Impact

This project is valuable for all contributors because they can have fun discovering the characteristics of the Settimocielo products but also because any supporter can contribute to the development of new products. The project is also valuable for the whole world because the products are precious in different situations, not only for personal usage but also, for example, for social initiatives.


 

Risks & Challenges

Settimocielo is not a startup, we are already running farms and a small production facility. We already have products on the market so, the worst thing that could happen is not to raise enough funds to grow as expected. We have the knowledge. Technologies and equipments are already on the market so we have to combine together all elements, use our organic raw products and our and your fantasy to obtain new special foods. We have big challenges in front of us but we are strongly determined to go ahead, overcoming any obstacle.


 

Other Ways You Can Help

Even if you can not contribute with money, you can help us in other important ways. You can share our project through the social networks also using the Indiegogo tools you find in this page. You can submit us your ideas for new products you maybe able to develop together with us in the future or, if you like, you can describe your experiences and knowledge on our Facebook page.

If you are interested in a partnership for commercial or research purposes, please contact us at project @ ilsettimocielo.com

 

Thank you

story:
Our core mission is to be a local, Lowertown St. Paul business, contributing to the economy and culture where we live. We seek to provide a fun place for all the folks we love to come and hang out with us. We make excellent beer (more than 8 of them now!) which appeal to the widest segment of society possible. 

Culhane Brewing Co. has a passion for bringing people together in a place that is open, welcoming, and comfortable. We accomplish that by brewing beer that is enjoyed by all. Even non-alcohol-drinkers will enjoy the community we foster with a glass of our root beer.

Kathleen, our Brewer, is a experienced home brewer of 20 years and a certified BJCP judge (Beer Judge Certification Program), which grants her the professional credibility to objectively assess our beer. Her background is in chemistry with a focus on pilot plant work for the last 25 years. This gives her a very deep skill set for designing and running a brewery, so much so that she has designed & built the brewhouse herself.

Our Philosophy

Culhane Brewing Co. brings an opportunity for beer drinkers to explore new and creative beer flavors. Almost all of our beers are approachable session beers (you can drink more than just one in a sitting, i.e. your palate is not overwhelmed), and arranged in a spectrum from easiest to most challenging.

Our Brewery & Taproom

At the beginning we will be operating the one of the smallest production breweries in the Twin Cities, a 2 barrel (62 gallon) brewhouse. Come in, have a tasty beverage, and  learn all about it.

We are designing our taproom to be a warm, inviting, acoustically comfortable space. Also, we plan to make our taproom available for groups that wish to hold meetings or events. 

How Have We Gotten This Far?

We have fire and dedication to create something for us and the community, with a strong brewer at the helm. We've been working on this for about 4 years now when we first took the idea and seriously began exploring the possibility of a taproom/brewery in early 2013. We've transformed this idea into an excellent business plan, created the designs for the space we want, invested over $60K of our own monies and, like many small businesses, are taking the chance to make our dream manifest. The fact that you are here reading this is helping us achieve that.

Why Indiegogo?

We want to bring our friends and fans on board in this new chapter of our brewing history. With your help, our business partners and the support of our families we will be able to complete the physical construction of the brewery/taproom. At this moment you will be supporting the construction of the bar area.

How Your Contribution Will Help Us

We live in St. Paul and enjoy the community and flavor of the area. We've become proud of it, so much so that we want to open our business here where our money will help support the area. We are a craft brewery with a pub style place to not only enjoy a pint, but to gather, socialize and foster community. This space will be YOUR space too for small meetings or game nights, and will be family friendly, acoustically balanced with passive sound absorption built in to be comfortable everywhere.

Why You Are Important and How You Can Help

We love beer, but more than that (really) we love the community that having a pint with others fosters when we are together. We are creating a community space, for everyone to come hang your hat here for a bit with us.

Whether or not you are contributing, you can help by spreading the word. Let your friends, family, coworkers, and community know that there is a new brewery opening on the Lowertown in St Paul soon!  We want a gathering space that is open, comfortable, and safe. 

Thank You!

Cead Mile Failte!

story:
WHO WE ARE....

Hi there! I'm Miranda Betts, Owner and Chef at Farm to Face.  For those of you who do not know Farm to Face, we are a seasonal staple and yearly fixture at the Baltimore Farmer's Market selling delectable, locally inspired falafel wraps, home made sauces and spreads, and inventive teas and juices.  For years, not just at the farmer's markets, but even at my home kitchen, I have been curious and inspired by the endless grandeur that our Mid-Atlantic growing region has to offer for ingredient selection and food choices. 

Every morning of the farmer's market, we get to choose from an endless colorful pallet of veggies to include in our menu.  I do believe that the greatest excitement that we get from assembling our wraps is the surprise and awe we get from each and every one of you who come to frequent our stand. With daily quotes like, "Oh my god! There's peaches on it!" and, "I'm so happy it's tomato season," are everything that drives us to continue with our growth.  There is one statement from the majority of you that we regularly get and we are finally acting upon...  "When are you opening a restaurant?"

Well, here's the good news.  After years of searching and waiting for the perfect opportunity we have come across a beautiful location in Hamilton-Lauraville that will suit our needs and help us to be able to bring you exactly what you have been asking for, for years. By opening this little cafe we hope to bring you not just our wonderful falafel wraps, but also a new and rotating seasonal menu mainly derived from our partnerships with our local farmers in the area. 

We are so excited and overjoyed to take this step. Primarily to expand on what we can offer to you in the form of a great local and seasonal menu. Your patronage over the years has been the main driving force for us and we hope that with your contribution we can find the means to purchase new equipment, install a hood for cooking, and to aid in the general start up costs for the restaurant.  We are so entirely grateful for your dedicated and consistant support to our concept now and over the years.

What Our Needs Are and What You'll Gain

In the past we have been extremely hesitant to take the next step in our growth primarily due to the costs that it takes to open up a brick an mortar.  It's intimidating, exciting, scary and fun! The time has come to take the leap and create something permanent that is enjoyable and highly desired for our community. This is where we will need your help. We have a laundry list of needs but can also operate with in a shoe string budget if we are unable to acquire our maximum amount of funding. Below is a list of both immediate and up coming needs required for us to be able to open up shop with in the next few months.  If we are unable to reach our entire goal we will use your contributions where they are needed most in order for us to open and operate. 

  • $10,000 permits, licenses, deposits
  • $10,000 security system, wifi, telephone, etc. 
  • $30,000 for equipment (refridgerators, freezers, ovens, dish and glasswear, cash register, safe, juicers and blenders, tables, chairs, ETC.)
  • $5000 for the installation of a sit in bar top right by the kitchen
  • $20,000 installation of a small hood and range
  • $20,000 for a new falafel mobile, sadly our market vehicle is having some age related health issues. 

By contributing we'd like to offer some amazing perks for your belief in our growing project. We will have an amazing array of reusable cups for our signature juices and smoothies, t-shirts, catered events, and even cooking classes and demos for you and your friends. Please refer to the perks list for more thorough descriptions.

What We Hope To Acheive....

Once we are able to open up shop we are so entirely excited to bring to you the amazing vegetarian culinary delights that my crew and I have constantly been brainstorming about. We are always sharing ideas on what we can do to make it better, and what we would love to expand on in our menu. Falafel is not the only thing that we know how to make well.  We will offer wonderful vegetarian breakfast dishes, Homemade sauces and spreads, traditional favorites like lasagna, and gluten free and vegan options.  I'm really excited to integrate juices and smoothies with ingredients sourced from our local farmers. Our concepts and ideas are endless! We want our menu to be derived from the bounty that we get seasonally from our farmers here in the area and give your flavor palettes a chance to explore everything that we have at our finger tips. 

Risks & Challenges

As I have stated before, it is so great to be moving forward.  With any project there are always obstacles that need to be overcome. I have a huge sense of pride in our resourcefulness whenever a challenge arises for us.  However, this new venture is an entirely different ball game. For example, I hope that we will be opening within the month but I also know from friends in the business that one month could turn into three.  We have a lot of support from our community and between that and our resourcefulness I am certain that we will be able to get through any challenge that we will face. 

Farm to Face would not be Farm to Face with out all of the amazing people that I work with on a daily basis. Their support and input is what makes it so great. I really do believe that my crew is just as excited as I am for the new prospects of this permanent home for us. They are one of the driving forces for why we will succeed. 

Other Ways You Can Help

We completely understand that not everyone can support us with a financial donation.  However, you can always help by donating some of your time.  Please feel free to spread the word about our future home in Hamilton-Lauraville.  Share our campaign with your friends and tell them about all the great things we want to offer you in the future. I can't wait for the day that we open our doors for you!

story:
NutriLabel calculates the nutrition information of recipes in real time and prints a label 

This way you can adjust the calories, carbohydrates, proteins, salt or cholesterol, as well as the  level of vitamins and minerals. NutriLabel also allows you to know if something has an allergen that may be harmful to someone’s health.




NutriLabel not only detects allergens, but also the beneficial properties of your recipes

Foods can contain substances that cause adverse effects in some people, so-called food intolerance, and, more severe, food allergies. However, they can also have very positive health properties.



Eat healthily and safely

NutriLabel makes it possible for everyone to have access to the knowledge that nutrition information provides in order to improve their diet and that of those around them.

 

Examples uses of NutriLabel

When the family gets together to do the year’s canning, when we make dinner for our close family and friends, when we prepare dishes and smoothies that help us be in better shape to do sports.

In addition, if you make dishes for your health food store, restaurant, or catering business, or if you sell pastry or prepared foods for others, you will finally be able to put a label with nutrition information on it as is required by law these days!


 


 

NutriLabel is also a digital cookbook where you can create, change, save and share your recipes



 

You can copy your label’s link and paste in on your website or blog, as shown here
 





How does NutriLabel work?




Diet Creator and the Brother mini-printer combine to simplify nutrition labeling

Professional, high-speed label printer helps you quickly tackle nutritional labeling tasks in your shop with Brother QL-810W/QL-820NWB.

Create amazing nutrition labels using effective paper labels for glass containers, food and bakery boxes, stand-up food pouches & bags, wraps and more. The super-fast, printing up to 90 standard labels per minute with black text at 300dpi; help save time on big projects. An auto cutter allows for printing 1 or multiple labels at a time, eliminating wasted label sheets.

 


 


Summary of perks
 


 

 

NutriLabel has your geographic area’s specific ingredients with reliable nutrition information

Every country or region has its own ingredients which, although they are often similar to others, have distinct nutritional compositions shaped by different environmental factors. NutriLabel has almost all the world’s food composition tables.

 

Diversity

The enormous variety of our planet’s foods are classified into different groups: fruits, vegetables, legumes, seeds, nuts, diary products, meats, seafood, etc. Some, of the same group and kind, can have different nutrition information, as shown in the following examples.

 

The NutriLabel label fits on any type of packaging



Timeline



The team

We specialize in technological solutions for nutrition.

 

We develop software with modern, robust technology
 




Brother Industries ensures we have a reliable device
 




NutriLabel’s story

I’m Joaquín Torres, serial entrepreneur specialized in IT (information technology). I founded Diet Creator five years ago with the mission of simplifying the complex work of preparing quality nutrition plans using software that drastically reduces the hours of work of calculating and analyzing. Little by little our solution became known and many nutritionists began to use it.

Our society, more conscious every day of the intimate relationship that exists between food and health, demands solutions accessible to everyone. As fruit of this need we thought about how we could help many people – not just nutritionists – to benefit from our software’s capabilities. That’s how we came up with NutriLabel, which allows anyone to create balanced recipes, having the nutrition information presented on a label that can also be printed and affixed to any type of packaging, just like those on the products in supermarkets whose labeling was, until now, only in the reach of food companies.


FAQs

Is NutriLabel software or a device?
NutriLabel is a solution that integrates Diet Creator nutrition software with Brother’s portable label printer. Nutrilabel is not a brand, it is a functionality of our Diet Creator software.

What does this integration consist of?
It consists of the precise fitting of an SVG image of the standard label generated by the software – font type and size – to the size of the paper in the printer so that you only have to print without worrying about setup, cutting, etc.

How does it work?​
You open the software on a computer, tablet or even on a smartphone to prepare the recipes or menus, and the nutrition information, the warnings of possible allergens and the properties of the foods are shown automatically. When you’re done, you just print the labels. You also have an advanced option that permits you to personalize the labels.

Can I print the labels on any other printer?
Yes, but you will encounter a number of drawbacks, beginning with the fact that the printers are not designed specifically for labels, which will require you to configure the formats, look for special adhesive label paper and cut the labels by hand.

Other points to keep in mind are:

  1. The printer is portable and only weighs 2.56 lbs. (1.16 kg.), which allows you to move around freely with it and print anywhere.
  2. Nutrition labels generally have a width of 2.3 in. (60 mm), so the width of the paper is key to not having to cut it to size with a paper cutter. The Brother label is 2.4 in. (62 mm) wide, perfect for simply printing and affixing at once.
  3. The paper of the Brother printer is waterproof so that the ink does not run, and it sticks to any surface: cardboard, glass, plastic, etc.
  4. The printer resolution is up to 300 dpi x 600 dpi, printing shop quality!
  5. Brother prints 90 labels 3.2 x 2.3 in. (80 mm x 60 mm) per minute, a impressive speed for a portable printer that allows you to label as many containers as you can without wasting time because of the printing.
  6. With one roll of paper you can make 360 labels 3.2 x 2.3 in. (80 mm x 60 mm).
  7. The cost per label is only $0.04 for one color and $0,08 for two.

In the end, any printer other than Brother would be more of a burden than a benefit for the job to be done. If you need to print thousands of labels for the same product, you can send the print file to your trusted printing shop to do the work.

Can I use the software without having to buy the printer?
​Of course. Diet Creator has one version for chefs and another for nutritionists that don’t include a printer, as seen in the summary of perks. The difference between the two versions is that with the version for nutritionists you can do anthropometric and physical development followups for people. Other than that the functions are the same.

What differences are there between the two Brother printers offered?
The differences are that Model QL-820NWB, in addition to having Bluetooth which Model QL-810W does not, has a backlit LCD display with memory or function reader that allows the introduction of the date and time of printing, the previewing of different label templates that we’ve made and, with an external bar code reader, even identification of specific labels to be selected and printed without needing to confirm them visually on the display. These features can be useful if the printer is not connected to the software, which, at times, allows a certain independence. The manuals for the two models of printer included in the package are very clear about their features, in addition to which there are excellent video tutorials online.

If I get any of the rewards, can I get any type of help if I need it?​
Of course. Our customer support team will hep you whether by e-mail or video call (Skype), if you ask for it. 

 

Predictive calculation and easy label printing vs. laboratory and printing shop

Before NutriLabel, managing nutrition information and creating labels was very complicated and costly, as the services of a laboratory to analyze the foods had to be contracted, the design of labels commissioned and the labels taken to be printed. When the output is a small, hand-crafted or home-made, the traditional system isn’t an option given that the process described would have to be repeated for each product.

Thanks to the Diet Creator nutrition software, with NutriLabel you don’t have to send  the label for your products out anymore. Without leaving your desk you can do the whole process: instantly calculate the nutrition information and the percentage of the Daily Value (DV)*, and record the production and use-by dates. In addition, the software tells you – with warnings – of possible allergens that could affect people sensitive to them, so that the products don’t disagree with them. In this way you will meet the current regulations that require giving food information to consumers.

* The % Daily Value (DV) tells you how much a nutrient in a serving of food contributes to a daily diet. 2,000 calories a day is used for general nutrition advice.
story_txt:
NutriLabel calculates the nutrition information of recipes in real time and prints a label 
This way you can adjust the calories, carbohydrates, proteins, salt or cholesterol, as well as the  level of vitamins and minerals. NutriLabel also allows you to know if something has an allergen that may be harmful to someone’s health.

NutriLabel not only detects allergens, but also the beneficial properties of your recipes
Foods can contain substances that cause adverse effects in some people, so-called food intolerance, and, more severe, food allergies. However, they can also have very positive health properties.

Eat healthily and safelyNutriLabel makes it possible for everyone to have access to the knowledge that nutrition information provides in order to improve their diet and that of those around them. Examples uses of NutriLabelWhen the family gets together to do the year’s canning, when we make dinner for our close family and friends, when we prepare dishes and smoothies that help us be in better shape to do sports.In addition, if you make dishes for your health food store, restaurant, or catering business, or if you sell pastry or prepared foods for others, you will finally be able to put a label with nutrition information on it as is required by law these days!
 
 NutriLabel is also a digital cookbook where you can create, change, save and share your recipes
 
You can copy your label’s link and paste in on your website or blog, as shown here 


How does NutriLabel work?



Diet Creator and the Brother mini-printer combine to simplify nutrition labelingProfessional, high-speed label printer helps you quickly tackle nutritional labeling tasks in your shop with Brother QL-810W/QL-820NWB.Create amazing nutrition labels using effective paper labels for glass containers, food and bakery boxes, stand-up food pouches & bags, wraps and more. The super-fast, printing up to 90 standard labels per minute with black text at 300dpi; help save time on big projects. An auto cutter allows for printing 1 or multiple labels at a time, eliminating wasted label sheets. 
 
Summary of perks 
  NutriLabel has your geographic area’s specific ingredients with reliable nutrition informationEvery country or region has its own ingredients which, although they are often similar to others, have distinct nutritional compositions shaped by different environmental factors. NutriLabel has almost all the world’s food composition tables. DiversityThe enormous variety of our planet’s foods are classified into different groups: fruits, vegetables, legumes, seeds, nuts, diary products, meats, seafood, etc. Some, of the same group and kind, can have different nutrition information, as shown in the following examples. The NutriLabel label fits on any type of packaging


Timeline


The teamWe specialize in technological solutions for nutrition. 
We develop software with modern, robust technology 
Brother Industries ensures we have a reliable device 
NutriLabel’s story
I’m Joaquín Torres, serial entrepreneur specialized in IT (information technology). I founded Diet Creator five years ago with the mission of simplifying the complex work of preparing quality nutrition plans using software that drastically reduces the hours of work of calculating and analyzing. story:
My Name is Lauren Marshall, I am the owner of Real Fake Meats and a celebrated chef & food instructor from Halifax, Nova Scotia.

  • I am passionate about plant-based foods and love teaching people how vegetables can taste amazing without the meat and dairy. You may know me from season four of Top Chef Canada where I tried to prove to the judges that healthy food can be served at a competition level. I have a background in Holistic nutrition, teach Cooking at the Canadian School of Natural Nutrition and am a graduate (2006) from the Culinary Institute of Canada.
  • This business holds close to my heart because I truly believe in eating clean food with little ingredients that I like to call "funny stuff" as my mother struggled most of her adult life with diabetes, cardiovascular disease and many implications that came along with that. Healthy food can potentially help our bodies live a long fulfilling life and I want to contribute as much as I can to the health and wellness community in my home town. 
  • Contributing to this campaign will help us attain a dream of reaching as many people in the health conscious, vegan, and vegetarian  community with wholesome, good quality "meats" and "cheeses". 
  • We also just want to have fun. Making healthy fake meats are fun for us and we want to share our creations with as many people as we can!
  • Help us bring to life the MARITIMES FIRST Plant Based BUTCHER SHOP!!!!!

What We Need

We will be fronting the payments that are required for the initial build, but we are falling short for costs on purchasing equipment. We will use this money to get the last of our much needed tools and decor in place, including:

  • A new butcher case
  • Two new coolers and freezer for the kitchen and storefront; 
  • A Large Stand Mixer
  • Basin Sinks
  • Multi Layered Convection Oven
  • Counter and stools for the front windows (maybe we will even have some sandwiches on the menu *wink wink)
  • I-Pad // POS System
  • Butcher Block Prep Table

How you can help: 

Your support will allow us to speed things along to open as quick as we can! We are in the home stretch, and the end is in sight (finally). We just need a little help from our community to get our doors open by early fall. Can’t donate? That’s okay! 

  • Use the IndieGoGo Share tools to share our campaign with friends and family who you think might donate to our project.
  • Let everyone know that Real Fake Meats is re-launching their boxes with more than just that. We will be better than ever!
  • Like our Facebook page and follow us on Instagram (and share the campaign.)
  • Stop by for a treat when we open! 

Risks & Challenges

While the renovations are just beginning we’re up against the possibility of setbacks like delays in construction, holdups with permits and licensing, unexpected building issues and the list goes on. We’ve persevered thus far, and want you to know that we’re committed to opening no matter what’s standing in our way (because we already signed the lease so we have to!!) and can't wait to share every part of this project with you!

Love, 
Lauren Marshall & Staff

Real Fake Meats, Plant-Based Butcher

story:
Summary

Business owner, Roger McBride, has been a part of the Manchester coffee industry for ten years and a resident of the city for fifteen years. A passion for coffee and the love of his adopted home, Manchester, has prompted the development of Worker Bee Tea and Coffee. 

Working with two wonderful community based charities, the ethos of the Worker Bee Tea and Coffee brand is to “give back” to the people of Manchester and those less fortunate. We plan to contribute a percentage of the cost of each box of tea and coffee to our chosen charitable partners; We Love Manchester and Forever Manchester.

Both charities tackle important issues ranging from community based projects to homelessness and our collaboration will enable them to provide more support. Our ethos is that every cup of Worker Bee tea and coffee made, will help someone in need, both in and around the city.

 

Gifts For You

We are confident that everybody will fall in love the new Worker Bee tea and coffee range, so much so that we are giving away some, of our very first batch, to those pledging towards our target. In addition, we have some great gifts including personalised Worker Bee MCR mugs and coasters (created in Didsbury) and the fabulous reusable takeaway mug. We have opted for local suppliers wherever possible and are very proud that we utilise local businesses for our public relations, marketing and IT needs.

If we are only partially successful in terms of our funding goals, we would be forced to limit our production costs and ability to market the brand accordingly. This would, undoubtedly, impact on the amount we are able to donate to our charity partners in our first year.

 

The Value In Worker Bee MCR

We use only the best quality ingredients and work hard to create unique blends to ensure that every cup of our tea or coffee tastes great.

For every bag of tea of or case of coffee sold we will donate 10% of the sale price to our charity partners (spilt evenly between both charities). 

Provide the opportunity for venues in Manchester selling tea and coffee to become part of a coffee and tea brand specific to Manchester.

Enhance the experience of tea and coffee lovers in all Worker Bee MCR serving venues.

For our business partners, we provide a full branded concept – from tea and coffee to crockery, point of sale material and dedicated brand ambassadors and barista trainers. In short, we aim to work with our Worker Bee venues to ensure that they provide their customers with excellent products produced to the highest of standards.

 

Funding Target

This campaign will help us launch Worker Bee Tea and Coffee, across a wide selection of Manchester venues and businesses. The funds will help cover the cost of the new Astoria Storm Espresso machine, gifts for the campaign, crockery and most importantly our tea and coffee stock. Additionally, the funds will allow us to development an ecommerce website from the current landing page.

By achieving our target, we will be able to donate 10% of sales to our partner charities from the very first order. 

 

The Teams Experience  

The team at Worker Bee MCR have the required experience to establish a start-up business within the coffee industry and have expertise to ensure a successful partnership with our chosen charities. 

We have an experienced public relations agency to work alongside us to promote the brand and have enjoyed the creative involvement of videographers from What Marketing in producing the supporting video for crowd funding. As such, we have a clear and solid foundation which will, certainly go a long way to secure the brand’s success.

 

Risks & Challenges

Although we know we will be supplying a truly distinctive range of high quality products with unique branding, and a philosophy based in community, we are aware of the potential challenges facing a new business:

Competitors entering the market with a similar product: We are confident in having sourced premium products and providing these at a fair price, to enable us to support both We Love MCR and Forever Manchester. With a focus of high quality products, we aim to work with businesses who are dedicated to using great products and their own corporate social responsibility of giving back.

The perception that we are just another company jumping on the Manchester “bee” bandwagon in the wake of the tragic events last year: For those who know the company’s founder, they are aware that Roger has been a long-time contributor to other local charities both through his company and personally. In addition, Roger has long held the belief that his business can support other local businesses and that the launch of Worker Bee MCR can help create a new local coffee community.

 

Other Ways You Can Help

For anyone who is unable to make a pledge you can still help us achieve our goals. You can share this with your friends and family through social media and encourage your contacts to pledge or share our campaign.  

Ultimately, our goal is to create a sustainable business which provides support to our partner charities long after our crowd funding efforts have finished.

We will continue to share our progress and inform all our supporters of the milestones we reach as the brand is launched in venues across Greater Manchester. Most importantly, we will continue to help support the fantastic work of both We Love MCR and Forever Manchester.
